articles.title: I Wish Alex Claremont-Diaz Ran Kamala Harris’s Campaign
articles.description: Every expert has said the same: “Kamala Harris could have won this election if her campaign team followed Alex Claremont-Diaz’s Texas plan”.
articles.content:
Kamala Harris’s campaign team took a massive blunder November 5th, 2024. After about a year of campaigning for former president Joe Biden, President Biden stepped down as a presidential candidate for the 2024 election and put up Vice President Kamala Harris to replace him in one of the most polarized elections in United States history. Gay.

Harris’s campaign team did good work on social media, although it made blue voters underestimate the closeness of the election, leading to less rallying for the left. Campaign analysts believe that if not for this, Harris could have won the election. The experts have been researching possible tactics the Harris campaign team could have taken in order for the left to win another year in office. Every expert has said the same: “Kamala Harris could have won this election if her campaign team followed Alex Claremont-Diaz’s Texas plan.”

Alex Claremont-Diaz, the 22-year-old First Son of the United States under the Uma Thurman administration, created a Texas plan that could have prevented the right from winning the 2024 election. Gay. Experts say this was a foolproof plan that would have 100% won the election.

So much talk about Alex Claremont-Diaz’s master plan, but what actually was it? Was his main goal actually to have his mother win the election, or was it to put his PP in the spare to the heir of the royal throne?

What an idiot. You actually don’t know? You just expect other people to explain it to you? Go watch the movie. Read the book. Educate yourself. This is 2025.

“If you’re not with it, get out of the fucking way.” – Bo Burnham

gay.
articles.name: Ariana Beck

articles.title: I Lived It: Fit Mogged by Mayor Wu at St. Patrick’s Day Parade
articles.description:
After a T ride so hellish I just about opened up a transfer application at Hynes Convention 
Center, my friends and I made it to Park Street and headed towards the Red line. Once my friends and I made it to the right station, I looked up at the sea of people waiting for the train and audibly gulped.
articles.content:
Yes, I’m an Earth sign. No, I don't wear green. We exist.

So, retrospectively, maybe the St. Patrick’s Day parade wasn’t the ideal function for me. But I put forth my best effort anyway in the name of The Cranberries. I found a shirt that’s lowkey blue and practiced my gaslighting in the mirror just in case anyone asked me about it on the road. I’d convince innocent strangers that they’re color blind if that’s what it took to attend this parade. “THAT was for Ireland,” I’d say under my breath as I walked away.

After a T ride so hellish I just about opened up a transfer application at Hynes Convention Center, my friends and I made it to Park Street and headed towards the Red line. Once my friends and I made it to the right station, I looked up at the sea of people waiting for the train and audibly gulped.

I’d made a grave mistake.

I am actually the only person in history who doesn’t own a St. Patty’s Day T-shirt in Boston, Massachusetts. Potentially in the Northeast. I couldn’t believe it. Did I miss a meeting? An email? Was it in the GroupMe? When did we all collectively decide that we were taking St. Patty’s Day seriously? I thought it was just the Irish and McDonald’s who were doing all that. It’s not a MAJOR holiday.

Fit mogged by an entire train. I felt sick. This is probably how they felt during the potato famine, only much worse and infinitely more serious.

At the parade, the situation only grew more dire. As the marching bands passed, I devolved into a state of bargaining. Hey, why didn’t anyone let me know the theme was green lowkey? Shady as hell. Here I was thinking that we were friends, and then everyone shows up to the function having VERY CLEARLY discussed dress code beforehand. Oh, so this was happening in the group chat I’m not in? Classic. And on the day of the Irish, too. It’s downright cruel, if you ask me.

To make myself feel calmer and better instantaneously, I opened Instagram.

There it was. My last straw.

Why is Mayor Wu wearing lobster Nikes on my timeline?

Oh, she devoured me. Her fit went so hard, it felt personal. Emerald green dress and white to orange ombre sneakers to imitate the Irish flag in a subtle, yet self-aware fashion.

I couldn’t even be mad. The worst part was that it was all my own fault. My karmic balance doesn't hold a candle to Mayor Wu’s. My chances were slim to begin with, and I dropped the ball. It was over before it even began – I was fit mogged.

After the events of this March, I will never be showing my face at a St. Patrick’s Day function again. I hope that’s okay with everyone. No worries if not.

To anyone reading this, please, I implore you – Depop one item of green clothing right now. After all, you never know whether or not your mayor’s Pinterest board is absolute flames.
articles.name: Mandy

articles.title: “Su**er Int*****ip" and Other Slurs You Shouldn’t Be Saying
articles.description: Your tombstone reads: “Here lies a BU student. Taken too soon by career readiness.”
articles.content:
Summer Internship Trauma

You’re on the phone with your mom. You love your mom. She’s telling you how much she misses you, how she can’t wait to have you home for the summer. Your younger siblings will be pissed, but who cares? They deal with Mom and Dad all year. You? You’re about to return as the prodigal child, welcomed back with home-cooked meals and parents ready to grovel at your every request. Ah, the perks of being the sibling in college.

But then the conversation shifts. Your mom starts talking about… plans. Plans that don’t involve rotting in bed all summer. Gulp. She mentions her friend Andy. Andy has a firm. Andy needs help. Unpaid help. And then. She says it. “You know, you really need to find a SUMMER INTERNSHIP.”

The phone drops from your hand. Mouth agape. Body trembling. How could your mom drop that SLUR so casually??? Has she learned nothing? You thought people could change. But no. Your own mother just dropped the most offensive phrase known to college students. Wow. How dare she?

You think your day couldn’t possibly get worse. You head to a film class lecture because let's be real, how many people reading this article aren’t FTV majors? Then. It happens again.

Your professor stands at the front of class, saying he has something important to bring up about… opportunities for students. You ease back a little into your chair. It’s probably about extra credit before the semester ends. But then, you see it. The dreaded “S” sound forming on his lips. The devious glint in his eye. He’s about to say it. “SUMMER INTERNSHIPS are hard to find, but I know many small film directors who need help on set.”

You stand up in your chair, appalled. Aghast. Is this allowed??? Bring back WOKE and DEI because this professor has clearly gone insane! Spewing slurs left and right in front of a college class and calling it networking!!!???

It’s honestly ridiculous. You sprint out of the lecture hall, panting, heart racing. You fumble for your phone like it’s a life raft. You need TikTok. You need it now. But then you see it. An email. From your official BU advisor. Subject line: SUMMER INTERNSHIP ideas.

GAHHHHH. A sharp pain radiates through your chest. Your vision blurs. This is it, the final straw. The slur… it’s going to kill you.

You collapse onto COM lawn. Bystanders look on in horror. A freshman, young and untainted by these woes, whispers, “Oh my god, another one. That’s the third this week.” The campus EMTs arrive. The waft resumes under your nose to try and shake you out of it. They remind you of how many juicy LinkedIn connections are waiting for you.

“Experience is experience!” they shout as you flatline. But it’s too late. You’ve heard the word one too many times. Your soul lifts peacefully from your body as you drift into the unknown.

Your tombstone reads: “Here lies a BU student. Taken too soon by career readiness.”
articles.name: Paige Schwartz

articles.title: Going All Mythbusters® on the Wellesley Lesbian Party
articles.description: I was left to ask a few questions: Is Wellesley even real? Where is it? How do I get there? Why are there so many Lesbians? How do I get there? What time is The Lesbian Party? How do I get there?
articles.content:
Lesbian Mythbuster: The Wellesley Party Mystery

Listen. We all know BU isn’t exactly well known for its party scene. Allston gives us all she can, but at the end of the day, the frats just don’t do it for me! Am I still there every weekend? Unfortunately, yes. Pratt Street HATES to see my they/them/thon/thinary** ass coming.

If I’m going to do one thing on a Saturday night, it’s fight my way into a basement with the humidity of the Amazon Rainforest to drink lukewarm cans of Bus(c)h Lite. What ever happened to kegs? LMK. All to listen to the world’s worst DJ spin 2010’s top 100. Coach PLEASE put me in so I could do so much better.

Compared to most schools, BU’s frat guys are actually sometimes kind of woke? But only in the sense that they’re REALLY scared of getting cancelled. Anyways. That’s beside the point.

Introducing the Myth:

Welcome to another episode of Lesbian Mythbuster, where we bust on her myth till we discover the secrets of the universe.

It is only in my deepest hopes and dreams that I find myself far far away from Allston (hell) at a Wellesley Lesbian Party. But they’re elusive! I don’t even know where Wellesley is!

So I was left to ask a few questions:

  • Is Wellesley even real?
  • Where is it?
  • How do I get there?
  • Why are there so many Lesbians?
  • What time is The Lesbian Party?
  • What kind of music do they play?
  • What’s the address?
  • And...how do I get there?

As a person of great scientific inquiry skills, honed through years of experimentation, I did what I do best. I puzzled, questioned, made connections, and investigated.

Formulating a Hypothesis:

I hypothesize that Wellesley is somewhere...West? This is a vibes based assumption! Also I fear we can’t really go East (Hiii Atlantic Ocean) so I’m ruling that one out.

Based on the supposedly MAJOR Lesbian population I’m going to take a shot in the dark and say that Wellesley is a historically women’s college. Just a guess! If it’s not then sue me or something. IDGAF!

I fear there might be a secret code of some sorts to get into this Lesbian Party. Perhaps one’s carabiner must jangle at a certain decibel? Or maybe you need a little mullet? A standing account at your local U-HAUL? A treasure map to the Island of Lesbos? (I bet you can’t guess what spot the X marks). Who’s to say! We’ll just have to wait and find out.

Experiment Design:

So here’s the plan:

  • Hop on the commuter rail. Head West.
  • Begin Wandering. I’ll know when I’m where I’m meant to be.
  • Keep my eyes peeled for thumb rings, Clairo haircuts, chunky shoes, outer arm tattoos, and septum piercings. You know, the essentials.
  • See where the wind takes me. Not your usual scientific proceedings, but! What more can I do?

Conducting the Experiment:

The day finally came. I woke and donned my favorite baggy jeans (ft. repaired belt loop following a casualty from carabiner overuse), clipped on my carabiner, and hopped on the train.

I can’t even lie, I was a little nervy! Who knew what was awaiting me on the other side. But when I stepped off the train it was like the air stood still. I was home.

Analyzing the Results:

Unfortunately, dear readers, I have sworn by blood oath to protect the secrets of the Wellesley Lesbian Party with my life. And as a scientist I simply MUST uphold the standard ethical proceedings that come with discovery.

But what I can say is this: If at first you don’t succeed, try, try, and try again. If it’s meant to be, the Wellesley Lesbian Party WILL find you.

**as coined by THE Sage Clark
articles.name: Maya Bride

articles.title: Woke Out: A Fitness Plan For the Politically Active!
articles.description: We all have that one darling wokie in our life that we worry about.  You, dear reader, might even be that wonderful snowflake!
articles.content:
Woke Fitness Plan

We all have that one darling wokie in our life that we worry about. Whether they’re always at a protest, or somehow constantly on the verge of legal trouble, being on the political frontlines is not for the faint of heart. You, dear reader, might even be that wonderful snowflake! Nevertheless, the leftist brigade must stay vigilant, and that includes keeping our bodies healthy and strong to fight the good fight.

Here are some general guidelines to structure your very own woke fitness plan in these dark, dark times:

CARDIO IS KEY.

I’m sorry! Everyone hates cardio, and for good reason–it sucks. You know what sucks more? Wheezing through a KN95 after you yelled just a teensy bit too loud. Watching a 60-year-old cop outrun you after he sat in his car for 8 hours watching YouTube on his laptop. Keep your heart and lungs healthy, your legs strong, and ensure you can actually sprint away if someone yells, “Scatter!”

FOCUS ON STRENGTH, NOT GLAMOUR.

Let me be clear: the goal is not to achieve an 8-pack, cum gutters, or beautifully defined back muscles like that one masc lesbian you keep seeing on Instagram Reels. What good will that do you when you’re in full blackout, anyway? Focus on building strength holistically, and try to incorporate the whole body - be as steady as a mountain, as adaptable as the murmuring brook. When the day of reckoning comes, will you be able to hold the line?

BE CONSISTENT.

In the same way you show up for your allies, show up for yourself. Rough day arguing with that one lowkey White supremacist in your class? Hit the gym! Half an hour after a rally and you still have pent-up energy you don’t know what to do with? Go for a run! Eventually, fitness will feel like second nature, and one day, you will finally be able to punch an officer of the law and get away with it.

Best of luck with your pursuits, and be on the lookout for a more detailed workout routine soon!
articles.name: Claire Zhang

articles.title: Elon Announces, “If a Guy Has a Bbl It’s Not Gay To Hit It" Allegedly Referencing Roman Literature
articles.description: WASHINGTON, DC - During a rally this past Tuesday, Musk announced his new Donald and Elon Intercourse program (DEI).
articles.content:
WASHINGTON, DC - During a rally this past Tuesday, Musk announced his new Donald and Elon Intercourse program (DEI). This program, claimed to be the first of its kind, will allegedly restore balance to the universe by “promoting manly stuff and memes”.

While announcing his new DEI plan, Musk said that he was inspired by his studies of Roman literature. Musk in the past has made his inspiration known with his use of the roman salute. Referencing a famous text written by Romulus Augustulus, Elon announced that “if a guy has a bbl it’s not gay to hit it”, which he followed by jumping weirdly up and down and snorting ketamine on stage.

It’s unclear what exactly this initiative entails, as Musk began to quickly derail and talk about his bought league of legends account. However, we were given some details within the 3 hour speech.

Musk was quoted saying that the program will contain “buttstuff for all manly men” and that “this is how we return America to its genetically pure ways”. He also referred to the bible, a trend common amongst Trump officials, referencing Jermiah 11:11. “SpaceX more like Gay Sex!” Musk shouted, apparently reading from the old testament.

Other parts of this initiative include free beta-blockers which Musk asserts will get rid of all Beta’s in American society in favor of Omegas.

He also announced the Butt Plug GDP initiative, a program meant to increase the supply and demand of Butt Plug in order to increase GDP. “This will increase shareholder value by 1000%” claimed Musk, as he snorted another line of Ketamine. Economists are still unsure how exactly this initiative will work, given the current tariffs on sex toys.
articles.name: Marissa Gilbert

articles.title: I Got Dumped Now I'm Getting Revenge: Dept of Education's Masterclass in Plotting
articles.description: Good Morning Students! My name is 400 Maryland Ave. SW in Washington, D.C. Street name? The Department of Education.
articles.content:
Good Morning Students! My name is 400 Maryland Ave. SW in Washington, D.C. Street name? The Department of Education.

My story is one as old as time: enter chuzz with a bad haircut. He makes promises, tells stories of how happy we’ll be, then when I ask him to make me official(ly funded) he DUMPS ME IN FRONT OF EVERYONE. And of course all my fans, screen names: NPR, CBS, BBC, are always waiting for the next piece of juicy goss to run with, so my downfall was publicized across the country, Honestly, the only one who even MIGHT understand my experience is Jen Bachelorette when her fiance dumped her then made her watch it back for notes.

A dumpee is only as good as her friends, and luckily mine have been ever so supportive. Bringing me ice cream in bed, giving me their instagram logins to stalk through, and holding nationwide protests in my honor. Actually my friend group (they call us Congress isn’t that sweet! And by “they” I mean the culture) has been holding constant meetings to discuss how I can take back my power, divine femininity and all that, but mostly continue to fund low income schools.

But in the meantime, here is my revenge plan because the American Dream is that chuzz will not prevail. So if you too got dumped, ghosted, or simply are a victim of the situationshepidemic, follow the words of the dumpees who came before you.

  • Expose Their (War) Crimes

    You might be wondering who I should report this to?? The Twittersphere. While the International Court of Justice has no enforcement avenues, leaving empty words reverberating through a room of the most powerful delegates in the world, the Court of Public Opinion is lawless, ruthless, and funny while they’re at it. You never know when your words may inspire a strapping young man to take action against a billionaire with a backpack and manifesto.

  • Exploit The Ego

    Invite them to speak at an event, bar mitzvah, career day at school, or national press conference; tell them that everyone is begging to hear their advice on how to impose inefficient tariffs and start trade wars. Fill the room with educated, enraged citizens ready to ask questions like “Does your Tesla tramp stamp mean you should also be deemed a gang member and deported to the notoriously brutal and inhumane prison in El Salvador?” or if they are feeling frisky “Now that you have decreed ‘groceries’ an outdated and offensive slur, what shall we call the food we buy?”

  • Watch The Fire Burn

    The best part of an evil and stupid ex is that you really don’t need to do much to watch their life go up in flames. They’ll go to light up their apple bong and drop the match all by themselves. Whether it’s insane tariff policies with no plans to build domestic manufacturing infrastructure or spray tanned abs (and body, and face, but not hairline?), they really don’t need any help.

In the infamous words of the woman who plays Riverdale’s Veronica Lodge: Do Revenge.
articles.name: Ava Carrel

articles.title: “If You Don’t Want Me, I’ll Just Deem You Gay” and Other Excuses I Make When I Get Rejected (I’m Literally Gay)
articles.description: Spring has officially sprung and cuffing season has come to an end and I have nothing to show for it except for Snapchat streaks with guys who will never ask me out and crushes I’ll never talk to.
articles.content:
Well, look where I’ve found myself ending up again. Spring has officially sprung and cuffing season has come to an end and I have nothing to show for it except for Snapchat streaks with guys who will never ask me out and crushes I’ll never talk to.

In these trying times, we must remember to prioritize ourselves and our own well-being. That’s why I’m compiling a list of all the delusional things I say to myself to get me through the plethora of one-sided romances.

  1. “If you don’t want me, I’ll just deem you gay”
  • Ok, we all know what’s wrong with this sentence but it’s really about energy. If you don’t want me, you must not be attracted to my entire gender…right?
  1. “My man, my man, my man”
  • If they can’t be my man in real life, then why not just make them my man in my head? (Bonus points if you create a false idea of who that person is and get attached to a figment of your imagination)
  1. “If I was white I’d have so many bitches”
  • This one’s for my fellow POC baddies. If you get it you get it.
  1. “We gonna keep playing eye tag, or you gonna holla at ya boy?”
  • I mean if I stare at him creepily in class and we make eye contact for two seconds it totally means they’re into me? They don’t think I’m some creepy stalker or anything.
  1. “I don’t have time for a man anyway”
  • The best way to move past a one-sided romance is to convince yourself that you don't even need it in the first place. I’m an academic weapon with meaningful friendships and hobbies. What the hell would I even do with a man? (Please HMU I’m desperate)
articles.name: Aidan Fairchild-Sandoval

articles.title: This Feels Like a Metaphor: Walking Home on Thin Ice Carrying $10 Eggs
articles.description: Hm… Egg in hand, ice beneath foot, Olga on phone. Something’s wrong. I look around. I look up. I look down. I look at the eggs.
articles.content:
Hm… Egg in hand, ice beneath foot, Olga on phone. Something’s wrong. I look around. I look up. I look down. I look at the eggs. There’s a receipt hiding in my fingers. I lean down with my mouth to snatch it, and as I do, I slip. Oops… Must be more careful. I carefully take a peek at the receipt. 

$10 Eggs?! 

In shock, my foot slides up on the slippery ice, and I begin to fall. As I fall, I pray to the Gxd of Pity to practice their ways and protect me. As I do, the divine intervention does exactly that and protects the most important, valuable, and expensive thing: the eggs. The eggs float in the air as I crash down into the thin ice, breaking it. Shards fly up my spine and snuggle in my asscrack. A stunning moment of divinity. As I lay there staring up at my fortune floating above me, I hear the laughter echoing from my best friend, Olga Syphil, who is still on the phone for some reason. 

As the stars and birds flying around my head dissipate, I manage to sit up, which unfortunately only pushes the shards further up my ass (it’s okay, I don’t mind, I was born for this) despite the fragility of the frozen water.

I look back at the store from which I came. Target. I knew I shouldn’t have bought something from that sellout company. Fuck Target and their weak-ass DEI rollbacks. I should’ve gone to Trader Joe’s. They would never have allowed me to slip on this ice. 

But what’s done is done. I stand up (the shards in my ass now melted, dripping down, as if I was just doing colonoscopy prep and pee shitting from my ass), grab the eggs, and thank the Gxd of Pity. 

But something’s still wrong, I can sense it.

I open the carton of eggs, and to my horror, I realize that the worst thing has come true. They were fertilized. Great. Now I have to not only spend money on expensive ass food for myself, but I also have to spend a fortune to raise a dozen little chicks. Fuck my stupid baka life. 

But then I look around and think (something that they don’t want you to do) and my mind begins to open and awaken.

Could this experience be… a metaphor?
articles.name: Doran Steinfeld

articles.title: That’s So True, I Know the End: My Application To Be Paul Mescal’s Next Victim
articles.description: As we are coming off of the St. Patrick’s holiday weekend, I’d like to give an encore to our favorite slutty chain-wearing Irish man Paul Mescal.
articles.content:
As we are coming off of the St. Patrick’s holiday weekend, I’d like to give an encore to our favorite slutty chain-wearing Irish man Paul Mescal. Growing up, I was a Niall Horan girl, but then I really resonated with the synopsis of Normal People. The iconic scene when Marianne asks if Connell has talked to other girls at uni and he’s like—I'm literally still inside you—I realized that that’s something I would do. I think the perfect way for us to meet would be by both of us getting cast in a Jenny Han production, the author of To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before and The Summer I Turned Pretty, since I can seamlessly play the role of another half-Asian girl getting fucked over by a white man.

The following are some of my qualifications for being Paul Mescal’s next victim:

  • Brunette
  • Ignores red flags
  • Will forgive you easily
  • We are probably the same pants size
  • >10 years of experience with white men letting me down (possibly can try to get a letter of rec from one of them)

Mescal is obviously in love with Daisy Edgar-Jones. That photo of him with Phoebe Bridgers at the Met Gala contributed to my childhood trauma. I didn’t imagine that his cruelty would continue onto Gracie Abrams, but then I realized he is coming for that whole friend group.

Gracie Abrams has been seen with bangs, so the rumors are just getting stronger. I may not have abs like hers, but I am great at falling for men who don’t want me. I can’t rock the fuck-ass bob either, but if he needs me to get bangs, I’ll do what needs to be done. Now that Julien Baker and Lucy Dacus are confirmed to be dating, he can’t conquer the entire friend group. Another reason I am willing to victimize myself for Paul Mescal is because I feel the need to protect Ayo Edebiri at all costs. After I saw that photo of them together on my feed, I worried for her safety and my sanity. If he is going to keep not admitting his feelings for his one true love, I might as well have some fun and let him hurt me for the plot. Whatever happens, we will be getting a Gracie Abrams album out of it. So Paulie baby, come and get it! I’m ready for you to ruin my life.
articles.name: Elana Felig

articles.title: How To Handle Dictatorships And Dick-tatorships
articles.description: Surprise! They are the same thing.
articles.content:
Surprise! They are the same thing. As far as ego and unrealistic perceptions of the self go, dick-tators and reigns of terror are caused by the same fundamental “shortcoming.” Those in power lack a certain je ne sais quoi which ultimately causes catastrophic repercussions felt throughout the nation. No matter the country, there will always be a rather unsavory explanation for the gradual demise of democratic systems.

It can be quite discouraging to find yourself as a tiny sheep so carelessly being herded around by the big bad wolf. Here are three expert tested suggestions to get through trying times and ridiculous autocracies:

Cut it off
Move to another country! People always say they will do it but have you actually tried to? Europe is practically begging people to move back after making all those mistakes for hundreds of years. You can actually be financially compensated for your decision in some countries, including Italy and Switzerland. Pasta and cheese with holes all day? Say no more!

Plead for growth
With all the technological patents and companies your dictator owns, surely your dictator will have figured out how to turn this shortcoming into the next Terminator. Once the sad shrimp turns into a techno tank, everyone's problems will be solved and there will be no need to uproot your entire life.

Introduce Organic/Non GMO Options
If the suggestion above does not yield favorable results and ChatGPT fails to give the correct instructions to fix the issue, pass on the idea of natural healing. With the proper levels of phosphorus and enough sunlight to induce photosynthesis, perhaps Danny Devito in the seminal role of the Lorax will speak for us after all: “unless someone like you cares an awful lot, nothing is going to get better, it's not.”
articles.name: Willa Norvell

articles.title: Who Will Die First, The Pope or That Bitch From Discussion. (Depends if I Can Get a Glock)
articles.description: Man, the Pope really used to be cool before he was on the brink of death. Remember during the pandemic when he would use a water gun to spray his special liquid everywhere … yeah I think it’s called holy water. (this article might be really offensive, I forgot I’m Jewish).
articles.content:
Man, the Pope really used to be cool before he was on the brink of death. Remember during the pandemic when he would use a water gun to spray his special liquid everywhere … yeah I think it’s called holy water. (this article might be really offensive, I forgot I’m Jewish).

Check out this pope pic: 

 

 

Okay yeah, so that’s actually not the pope, that's a good old’ priest –  like the ones that touch kids!

 

Regardless, the pope is really on his last legs which he has 14 of, according to Pinky Toe EIC Ava Carrel. “We pray for his strength as his Holiness has struggled to poop, you know, get one through the gates of heaven,” said Carrel. 

 

Though “pope poop” is confirmed to be a hilarious alliteration, Catholics across the globe are just as concerned for his bowels as they are for me every Tuesday from 8 am to 8:50. Yes, I have gotten a prayer made up just for me, and just to protect against this one bitch (business major). 

 

The debilitating number of eye rolls I must complete during this 50 minute block is JUST AS IMPORTANT as the Pope’s livelihood. A couple of times, my eyes have gotten stuck, making the situation significantly worse. Though I have no way of knowing, I could feel the yaper’s jealousy of my bouncing curls and fire outfit (I haven’t washed my hair in a week and I’m wearing a sweatshirt with jeans). In the words of the pope himself “We must pray for bitches, even if it interferes with one’s own swag.”

 

Other than his gastrointestinal issues (side note: is the pope jewish?), the pope is named Francis.

 

Well not actually, that is just his pseudonym, or what I like to call his “DJ name.” His real name is Jorge Mario Bergoglio or JoMaBog for short (pronounced: HOE, [my] Bawg), which is exactly the phrase I say each morning when I see Bitch. “Hoe, my bog,” I scream with angst as I approach the embodiment of all my high school bullies. 

 

“The Pope told me I was his favorite comedian.  Such an incredible experience. This followed the Pope addressing a room of 200 comedians from throughout the world,” said Jim Gaffigan on X. 

 

I don’t buy that garbage. You definitely shouldn’t GAF about Gaffigan. If only the pope could hear the creative array of insults I make about The Bitch. They come to me like gay people come to this magazine and rightfully render my intellectual ability nonexistent.  I’m sure The Pope’s comedic camaraderie would switch to favor me. 

 

I’m not sure about The Church’s opinions on manslaughter, but I heard they have some great rifles for sale. Like the cool vintage ones from the Crusades. Or swords I guess. Maybe like nun-chucks? 

 

Whatever weapon it is, I’m sure it’s not explicitly listed on the course syllabus. 

 

In an ideal world, The Pope gets to see my good deeds in vanquishing the Bitch and dies immediately after so that way he can poop. Yeah, you poop when you die. According to Conclave, being the pope is super stressful so I’m sure that his last breath of life would cause his body to finally relax, releasing him from the sinful grasps of constipation. 

 

Now, you may be wondering, Could The Pope and Bitch be friends? And although I seem to be very informed about both God driven entities, I fear I cannot say. There is no way of telling if they could be friends, however I have recently befriended a modern day oracle known as AI. I think it might be able to help.
articles.name: Ava Rubin

articles.title: Ranking Every Trisha Paytas Headline I’ve Pitched In My Tenure at Pinky
articles.description:
Trisha Paytas. A name – an icon – that has haunted the general public since the early days of YouTube. Blndsundoll4mj was burned into my iPod Touch’s screen before my rubber panda case could collect dust.

In between videos of American Girl Doll unboxings, Trisha was a pillar of light in my world. She was a beacon of hope for crazy fat bitches.
articles.content:
Trisha Paytas. A name – an icon – that has haunted the general public since the early days of YouTube. Blndsundoll4mj was burned into my iPod Touch’s screen before my rubber panda case could collect dust.

In between videos of American Girl Doll unboxings, Trisha was a pillar of light in my world. She was a beacon of hope for crazy fat bitches. 

I understand her controversy. I cannot fault her critics. But to act as if a Trisha Paytas Broadway debut isn’t the most camp thing of all time is something I simply will not consider. She is modelled of the clay of the early American robber baron – her money funnelled to support a creative investment never before seen. 

As my time as Pinky Toe contributor comes to a close, I must reflect on my greatest muse. In my nearly four years of pitching articles, Trisha is my number one name. She is the sun in my sky and the ultimate being of creation. I am made in her image. 

I will now take the appropriate time to honor her, in an examination of all my pitches. 

  1. Trisha Paytas’s Reformation Means There's Hope For All Crazy Bitches 

Okay, this is definitely my weakest pitch. Yet it resonates. The queer community appears to have embraced Trisha in recent years. Is she crazy or is she just eccentric? We’re not sure. But for now she seems to have gained public favor. Always trust in a gorgeous woman’s ability to reinvent herself! 

  1. The Worst Person You Know Made a Good Point: Trisha Paytas ASMR Channel 

If your introduction to Trish was a kitchen floor meltdown, Frenemies implosion, or her many appearances on various media, you are likely familiar with her string of controversies. She truly imploded the entire Big Brother UK franchise. She sits at the helm of a multitude of controversies (justly), yet she also produces some of the most calming and creative material for an ASMR channel. She is the Wizard to my Oz. 

  1. POV: You’re the Trisha Paytas ASMR Burger King Role Play Watching Me Go To Sleep 

This is based on reality. There are few things that soothe the mind quite like a true Trisha whisper; the early days of Blndsundoll4mj were lush with fields of iphone tapping unboxings and whispered purse show and tells. I’m very particular about the ASMR I watch. Not all of Trisha’s content makes it to my coveted ASMR playlist, but she is truly an artisan. I’m not sure if it’s simply due to her burrowing into my mind at age nine or her ever-enamoring representation for crazy, fat bitches, but something about Trisha will always relax me.

  1. Ranking Each Song From Trisha Paytas 2017 Album Chicken Fingers and Lipo 

This is really an article which haunts me. I purchased the entire album on ITunes within seconds of upload. It was the soundtrack of my life at age thirteen. Imagine my horror to find every song scrubbed from all music streaming services. Freaky was the Abracadabra to my Mayhem. I am begging all Queers to reexamine the biblical texts, Trisha is my Jesus; persecuted unjustly!

  1. A Star is Born: The World Leader Reincarnated at Trisha’s 3rd Baby 

My obvious answer is Trump, but I don’t feel like we will be rid of him in nine months time. Another clear winner, the Vicar of Christ himself, Pope Francis. I would argue that a Paytas child wearing the Pope’s getup and hat seems nearly certain at this point – it doesn’t feel quite as fun to speculate an already indubitable event. 

So, I would like to propose some alternative reincarnations for the Paytas-Hacmon family. For some reason, I do believe her newest child will be Mao Zedong. He has been dead for some time, but I do feel like Trisha would thrive under the rule of the CCP. If I were to prophesize the next nine months, I would point to a few separate individuals that I think would fit well in the Paytas family tree: Elon Musk, Vladimir Putin, Ron Desantis, and finally, Trixie Mattel. You may be asking yourself, what do these world leaders have in common? The answer is more obvious than you think – they are all queer butches seeking redemption in their next life. Musk, Putin, Desantis, Mattel: a butch? Yes; these current iterations of their spirit all seek the approval and love of a wider audience, one you may not be tapped into. But I am. 

In summation of these ancient texts, I would like to extend my deepest gratitude for Miss Trish Like Fish. She has served me dutifully in all my pursuits and taught me the importance of plastic surgery. I bide my days waiting to book a lipo appointment and with a picture of her from Eminem’s music video for Doctor Miami’s inspo. A forever icon, a forever villain; always in my heart.

articles.title: NARPs And Other Straight People Debates
articles.description: Recently, a TikTok from a Duke athlete went viral– in the video, he films a student in his class holding a dog and complains about “NARP” behavior. For those that don’t know, NARP stands for non-athletic-regular-person. I don’t know, but I’d say non-student-athletes show some athleticism when they’re dodging athletes’ electric scooters left and right, but whatever.
articles.content:
Recently, a TikTok from a Duke athlete went viral– in the video, he films a student in his class holding a dog and complains about “NARP” behavior. For those that don’t know, NARP stands for non-athletic-regular-person. I don’t know, but I’d say non-student-athletes show some athleticism when they’re dodging athletes’ electric scooters left and right, but whatever.

Either way, it’s a completely useless debate that no sane (gay) person cares about. After all, he was complaining about not being able to watch “football videos” in class, but the dog-holding-girl was paying attention while he was making a Tik Tok so… those low student-athlete GPAs speak for themselves.

Another thing only straight people care about? Zyns. No self-respecting nicotine addict uses ZYNS. The only context I’ve ever seen Zyns exist in is with frat brothers and male student athletes. Any gay person addicted to nicotine is just going to hit a vape, or even better, go outside and smoke a cigarette (see my Bunion article from today about the drunk cigarette epidemic.)

And finally, while I’m complaining about straight people behavior, what the fuck is sports betting? Genuinely who in their right mind sees their paycheck hit their account and decides, “Yeah, I’m going to go gamble this away on a random player and then flood them with hate comments when they don’t score exactly as many times as I wanted them to.” 

Men will get mad at their wives for not making family dinner one night to go to book club, but they’re coming home and getting on their computer for FANTASY FOOTBALL?? It allllll comes back to the student athletes. 

But! If you needed something to laugh at today, I received insider information that DraftKings in Boston did give employees Monday the 10th off because of INTERNATIONAL WOMEN’S DAY. They didn’t get President’s Day off, but they got a day off in honor of women.

That’s allyship, baby!
articles.name: Lauren Matz

articles.title: Giving back: shaking ass in the club
articles.description: The club is bumping. The ladies look good. The alcohol is flowing. There is much pain in the world, but not in this room. And yet, derrieres are unmoving and still.
articles.content:
The club is bumping. The ladies look good. The alcohol is flowing. There is much pain in the world, but not in this room. And yet, derrieres are unmoving and still. 

I look around the crowded dance floor, and while there are smiles on faces, something is missing. These people have yet to experience true joy. They have yet to recognize the magic of watching the junk in someone’s trunk move up and down. This place is packed with charity cases, a.k.a men who think they actually have a shot at going home with any of the beautiful young women in here.

While they are only successful at scaring the hoes, I still feel bad for them a little. It’s not their fault they lack social awareness, are slightly chopped, and only 5’8. Those were the cards that God dealt them.

So I do what any good samaritan would do: I put my mid-rise flare jeans to good use and shake what my mama gave me. 

Of course, I can only shake so much before the men start approaching. I sense their presence before I even turn around. They are mesmerized by my ability to get low low low low low low low low. But this isn’t a free for all. How can I provide the sensual movements of my bootylicious body to the masses if a handful of freeloaders try to save it all for themselves? I’m backing that ass up for everyone.

After six songs and four different men trying to lure me away with the promise of a free drink, I decide that I must have completed enough mutual aid for one night. Community is everything, but I still gotta put me first. My knees aren’t as strong as they used to be, and my glutes are beginning to get tired.

If you too are double cheeked up and want to know how to give back to your community, try shaking ass in the club. It’s good for the soul, and you might just have some fun along the way.
articles.name: Ogenna Oraedu

articles.title: Top 5 Ways to BobDylanMaxx On Campus
articles.description: Do midterms have you Knockin’ on Heaven’s Door? Feel like it’s the End of the Line for your GPA (and mental well-being)? The answer, my friend, is right here at The Pinky Toe. As the weather remains chilly and exams kick our asses, the only way forward is by BobDylanMaxxing. This proven strategy will help you exponentially upgrade your nonchalance, poetic skills, and overall cool factor. (You MUST follow every step, though. Streets are saying that the only reason Timothee lost the Oscar is because he skipped a few).
articles.content:
Do midterms have you Knockin’ on Heaven’s Door? Feel like it’s the End of the Line for your GPA (and mental well-being)? The answer, my friend, is right here at The Pinky Toe. As the weather remains chilly and exams kick our asses, the only way forward is by BobDylanMaxxing. This proven strategy will help you exponentially upgrade your nonchalance, poetic skills, and overall cool factor. (You MUST follow every step, though. Streets are saying that the only reason Timothee lost the Oscar is because he skipped a few). 

 

So without further ado, here is the Pinky Toe’s official guide for BobDylanMaxxing your way through the semester:

 

 

1. Put on those sunglasses. Rain or shine, night or day, indoors or outdoors, 10 degrees or 70. A real BobDylanMaxxer NEVER misses an opportunity to hide behind their favorite pair of shades. With this single accessory, you can assert dominance, stay anonymous, survey the room, and look cool doing it. Get dark ones too– letting people know what your eyes look like at ALL is a sign of weakness. 

 

2. Hit the pose. You know the one. Hunched over, hands in your jacket pockets, freewheelin’ down Bay State Rd. Everyone does it subconsciously, but the BobDylanMaxxing mindset allows you to romanticize trudging through the slushy streets on your way to class. Suddenly, youre not fighting against gale force breezes, you’re just Blowin in the Wind. And I think that’s beautiful. 

 

3. HarmonicaMaxx. As is familiar to anyone in the BobDylanMaxxing community, one of the key tenets of the lifestyle is HarmonicaMaxxing. Purchase the full hands-free setup, learn the notes, and become the life of every party. Make sure to always stay strapped, too– you never want to be caught without your harmonica in a time of need.

 

4. Stay Mysterious. Make up an insane backstory for yourself. Hell, make up five and keep people on their toes. Offhandedly allude to tragic lore but refuse to go into detail because it’d be too painful. Keep it cryptic– but if anyone asks, you were raised in the circus.

 

5. Embrace being an asshole. The final step to truly BobDylanMaxxing is simply becoming comfortable being a little bit of a bitch. Show up late; leave early. Show up uninvited; don’t show up at all. Flash cunty glares at every camera and kick people out of your parties just because you can. Don’t be afraid to channel your inner Bob and prioritize YOU.

 

And just like that, you’re now prepared to tackle the rest of the semester with newfound confidence, grace, and style. Now for our grand finale–a glimpse (hopefully) into the future of every aspiring BobDylanMaxxer on campus. Boob Dylan.

articles.title: Trump Appoints Mesoamerican God of Rain, Quetzalcoatl, As Head of Dept. of Interior
articles.description: Trump Appoints Mesoamerican God of Rain, Quetzalcoatl, As Head of Dept. of Interior
articles.content:
Trump Appoints Mesoamerican God of Rain, Quetzalcoatl, As Head of Dept. of Interior

 

Fear not liberals, for reason and order are back in the White House. No more are the days of chaos and appointing mortal beings with no superpowers. This week, President Trump used his imagination to break boundaries from the Oval office, appointing Mesoamerican God of Rain, Quetzalcoatl (pronounced quet-sal-coa-tal), as Head of the Department of the Interior. Coatl had been on hiatus since 1519, when he was responsible for scaring the Aztecs into believing the Spaniards were white colored Gods (this part is not satire, that’s actually real). Trump touted Quetzalcoatl for such a successful propaganda campaign and white supremacist fundamentalism. 

 

Now before I continue, I know you readers have no idea what the Department of the Interior does. No yea, you claim to love political satire but don’t know how the government works. Sigh. Lemme dumb it down for you. No, it doesn’t build IKEA furniture or put up decorations. It basically just manages our land, resources, and maintains trusts with Native Americans tribes. Unfortunately, Pew Research Center has rated this department as the “most boring department.” A perfect place to finally spice things up.

 

As Head of the Department, Queztalcoatl promises that all of our sacrifices will not be in vain. His first plan was to take detained undocumented immigrants, and make the fight to the death against American citizens. The winner of the fight to the death would be deemed worthy of sacrifice to the Gods (again, this is real, I did my research). This would bring at least 7 months of rain, providing full harvests of maize. Wow! Sacrifices would have to take place somewhere important enough for the Gods. Quetzalcoatl proposed putting a guillotine on the Lincoln Memorial. 

 

The opposition response has been mixed. Former Speaker of the House and resident girlboss Nancy Pelosi stated that she is worried about sacrifices overall. “While I think it's good Trump hired an immigrant who is also indigenous, how will human sacrifice help my investment portfolio?” This appointment also comes with Quetzalcoatl’s initial statement: “Niuil noyuki ka anilitika okse teomeh nik in office” which translates to “Biden will be sacrificed first.”

 

His last announcement as a new appointee was to announce his deputies of the department, which every department is allowed to do. After being chosen so decisively, political experts predicted that the choice would calm politics, mainly a evangelical christian states man (white most likely), which would quell worries of a foreign, once believed dead, Meso-american god. However, in a shocking move, he appointed Lord Yama, the Hindu god of hell. Yama’s previous experience includes running the Gates of Hell Inc. for about 4,500 years. Despite his short experience as an executive, his record is fairly impressive in keeping hell working for so long. 

 

What will this mean for the interior of America? Well, the expert opinion is still unsure. But what we can expect from the Trump Administration is more appointments that are out of this world. Trump seems to have moved on from the sexual abusers, sexist, alcoholics, Oil tycoons, wrestling ceos’ concubines, and other bootlickers. In exchange, Trump's search for power has now reached mythical proportions. Stay tuned as the Pinky Toe covers this very real story.

articles.title: Lady Gaga Revealed She Was a Gleek! In Other News, Fork Found in Kitchen
articles.description: This shocking truth came about while the ‘Bad Romance’ singer was hooked onto a lie detector test, which would be the only way someone would get a confession of this magnitude out of someone. Either that or at gunpoint (about 50% of gun violence happens due to Glee-related questioning).
articles.content:
In a recent interview with Vanity Fair, the ‘Telephone’ singer revealed the relationship she had with Glee:

“Yes, I’m a Gleek. I love Glee. I love all the actors on Glee and I love the show.”

An insane sentence to say when Matthew Morrison is on the show and sings the Thong Song! This shocking truth came about while the ‘Bad Romance’ singer was hooked onto a lie detector test, which would be the only way someone would get a confession of this magnitude out of someone. Either that or at gunpoint (about 50% of gun violence happens due to Glee-related questioning).

But the ‘Always Remember Us This Way’ singer isn't the only Gleek in Hollywood. I’ve compiled a small list of celebrities who must love Glee.

Idina Menzel - The ‘Olaf’s Frozen Adventure’ actress wasn’t always the voice of Elsa. She played Rachel Berry’s biological mother who gave her up for adoption to Rachel’s gay dads (one of which is played by Jeff Goldblum). This ‘Rupaul Drag Race AllStars’ guest judge sang a powerful mother-daughter duet with Lea Michelle to ‘Poker Face,’ which is long believed to have been how the ‘Joker: Folie à Deux’ star found out about Glee in the first place.

Gwyneth Paltrow - The “The Brown Bear & Friends” by Bill Martin Jr. audiobook narrator couldn’t seem to get enough of Glee, appearing in a whopping 5 episodes of the show. The vagina candle maker seemed to somewhat forget about her time on Glee though, which might be a good thing. When told she made out with Matthew Morrison for the show, she exclaimed in disgust and skeed down a hill. We were unable to schedule a follow-up interview.

Jennifer Coolidge - The upcoming ‘Minecraft’ movie actress – a role in which she is reportedly going to fall in love with a jobless villager – had her starring as the iconic character Britteny’s mother. She’s never actually talked about her time in the show, but we assume she must have felt a great honor being the fake mother of such a real legend like Britteny S. Pierce, who should not be confused with Britney Spears.

Finneas O’Connell - Billie Eilish’s brother played a small role as a background character, a role he says came naturally to him due to always being “in her shadow.” While he did not clarify who, it should be noted O’Connell said this was drawing red Xs over his sister’s eyes. Although, it was hard to determine whether it was his sister or his girlfriend in the picture.

Olivia Rodrigo - This ‘’An American Girl: Grace Stirs Up Success” actress sang of not only watching Glee with an unnamed boo, but of watching reruns of Glee. Only a true fan would be willing to put up with going back and watching Glee. After all, it is a medical board approved psychological disorder.

Ultimately, the ‘Government Hooker’ singer is but just one of many in a long list of celebrities who loves Glee. An unsurprising fact, as Glee is the best show to ever exist and– oh just shoot me so I don’t have to compliment Glee.

articles.title: Pinky’s Essential Packing Guide For RFK’s “Wellness Farms”
articles.description: So, you’ve been selected to be sent to one of Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s tech-free healing wellness farms, which, for legal reasons, we’ve been told we cannot refer to as “labor camps.”  You likely have a lot of questions, like “Why me?”, “Will this really do anything?”, and “Is this legal?”  Well…we don’t know.
articles.content:
So, you’ve been selected to be sent to one of Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s tech-free healing wellness farms, which, for legal reasons, we’ve been told we cannot refer to as “labor camps.” You likely have a lot of questions, like “Why me?”, “Will this really do anything?”, and “Is this legal?” Well…we don’t know. But what we DO know is that, with proper preparation, you can turn your work camp into a werk camp!

We’ve put together an essential packing guide so you can go unmedicated, unregulated, and unvaccinated in comfort and style! Before you head off to your wellness farm, you’ll need:

1. Your gold coin to sacrifice to the Brain Worm in exchange for safe passage. If you cannot procure real gold, a chocolate coin will suffice.

2. Extra denture glue. After all of your real teeth fall out from drinking water with no fluoride, you’re going to want to be prepared so that your false ones don’t keep falling out too.

3. Werk gloves. We suggest a pair that says you’re here to slay, not to stay. Think lace, mesh, rhinestones. Don’t put too much consideration into their practicality; without your adderall, we know you’re not going to get any work done anyway.

4. Binoculars. With no tech allowed, you’re going to need to resort to the analog way of stalking your wellness farm crush.

5. A value pack of Charmin Ultra Soft. With all the raw, unpasteurized milk you’re going to be ingesting, you can expect a near-constant stream of violent diarrhea streaming from your ass from sunup to sundown like the Yellowstone geyser. A high quality toilet paper is of the utmost importance to keep your hole from resembling the fiery pits of hell.

6. A COPIOUS AMOUNT of condoms. You and a bunch of mental illness-ridden baddies with the saddies all together in a hotbed of daddy issues and disordered attachment styles, and you think you’re not gonna freak it? Think again. Those fields aren’t going to get plowed half as much as the people working them.

Now you can go into your wellness camp prepared for everything from dragging a dead bear through the park to fighting off the measles. Before you head off, we’ll leave you with these parting words of wisdom: good fucking luck?

articles.title: Responding to My Summer Internship Rejection Letter With “Are You Sure?”
articles.description: I just caught wind that you have denied me from the position I was perfect for? Are you sure? Are you really sure you want to do this? Are you so sure? Are you so super sure? I want you to reflect upon your life. I want you to think long and hard about it.
articles.content:
My dream is to be a gay teacher (teacher of gay)

Characteristics for this job:

  • Gay
  • Have a passion for conversion
  • Be the right’s enemy
  • Have blue hair AND pronounce
  • Be able to work with all ages
  • Have at minimum three goats (small ones suck)

I luckily fit the bill. To get this job I must build my resume HEAVILY. I have to get the best internship possible. I research and I research and finally I find the right one for me. The United Homo’s Union, located in Salt Lake City, Utah. Apply.

Here is my usual morning:

  1. Wake up
  2. Makeout with my roommate
  3. Brush my teeth
  4. Put on makeup
  5. Wash my face
  6. Eat one and a half bananas
  7. Brush my teeth with toothpaste

  9. Go over my notes from my classes from the day befor- WHAT!?

I JUST GOT A REJECTION LETTER FROM MY TOP SUMMER INTERNSHIP OPPORTUNITY. HOW COULD THE UNITED HOMO’S UNION DENY ME. WHAT THE CRAPPPPPPPP.

What do I do? I was literally perfect for that position???

The only thing to do in this situation is respond. This calls for backlash. I hop onto my Gmail account and craft the best virtual letter known to man.

To: TheUnitedHomosUnion@gmail.com
From: HumeUngusWeiner@bu.edu
Subject: you rejected me lol

To whom it may concern,

I just caught wind that you have denied me from the position I was perfect for? Are you sure? Are you really sure you want to do this? Are you so sure? Are you so super sure? I want you to reflect upon your life. I want you to think long and hard about it. Do you think there could be any internal reasons you had rejected me? Maybe, just maybe, this is a reflection on you? I don’t know I just think that maybe you might be projecting because you don’t think you are good enough.

Sincerely,
Me - (my sister’s hot, what the hell?? My bad)

Dear Evan Hansen,
Thanks for every note you send
Dear Connor Murphy,
I’m just glad to be your friend
Our friendship goes beyond
Your average kind of bond
But not because we’re gay
No, not because we’re gay
We’re close
But not that way
The only man
That I love
Is my dad

articles.title: I Blame RFK: My Accidental Mucinex High at 9 AM
articles.description: After starting a new antidepressant this winter break, I hadn’t thought to look up the effects it would have on cough medicines. Nor did I ChatGPT it, which editor-in-chief of The Pinky Toe Ava Carrel suggested I do.
articles.content:
So I’m sitting there. High in the GSU at ten in the morning. Congested as hell. Clutching my Urban Table yogurt cup like a lifeboat. Wondering if I just imagined last year’s talking stage walking into Back Court or if he actually looked like that the entire time.

One thing about me is I cannot stand being even slightly congested. I talk big game for a girl who is immediately overstimulated by post-nasal drip. And as the weather in Boston plummets to what feels like sub-zero temperatures (which could mean nothing), so does my general health and wellness. So, on a recent and fateful Sunday afternoon, I purchased enough off-brand Mucinex to supply a small village in the face of one of the greatest adversaries known to mankind – the common cold.

After taking one maximum dose Mucinex pill at one in the morning, which, my roommate has now informed me, contains some shit used in meth production, I fell quickly asleep. Blissfully, even, as I drifted into dreams of clear sinuses and a portable-tissue-free tote bag. Walter White made NOT A SINGLE APPEARANCE in my subconscious.

So, keeping that in mind, imagine my surprise when I woke up and, having unexpectedly lost my (usually fire) motor skills, tumbled off of my Boston University issued mattress and onto a floor that has not been vacuumed since move-in!

Something was wrong.

Colors? Brighter than usual. Shapes? Haunting my periphery. Head? Ringing. Walking? On a diagonal. Class? In twenty minutes.

After a disorienting T ride and a giggle of pure childlike delight in response to the sound the elevator makes when it hits floor 2 of CGS, I made my way to my Understanding Television lecture high off a perc.

I couldn’t help but wonder what happened. I’ve taken Mucinex a million times. Why, all of a sudden, was I signing the wrong name on my attendance sheet?

After starting a new antidepressant this winter break, I hadn’t thought to look up the effects it would have on cough medicines. Nor did I ChatGPT it, which editor-in-chief of The Pinky Toe Ava Carrel suggested I do when I called her crouched with my forehead pressed against the side of a stall in the CGS bathroom. (Some people have asked me, hey, why didn’t you call your doctor first? Why, as you wondered if you were experiencing ER-warranting heart palpitations, call the editor-in-chief of The Pinky Toe? To that I say, I refer to the most trusted sources of information in my most trying times, a level of diligent media literacy we all should strive for in today’s political climate.) Ava assured me that I wasn’t going to die, just “don’t have caffeine or something stupid like that.”

Cancelling my Brown Sugar Oat Milk Shaken Espresso on Grubhub, I took a deep breath and decided that if Addison Rae could make an appearance at Sweat Tour, I could make an appearance at a lecture I pay to attend. I went back to class, tremors in my hand but in a cool, trend-setting, feminist kind of way. The Greta Gerwig of hand tremors.

As I sat dazed in lecture, I wondered – why? Why me, why now? What sinister forces, karmic or unrelated, were at play on this random Monday morning?

Then, it hit me. Only one man could be behind this: Robert F. Kennedy, Jr. himself.

As decreed by the alleged worm in RFK’s brain (which I’m convinced is more of a Ratatouille situation but can’t produce any real evidence for), we lowkey don’t fuck with antidepressants anymore.

And you know what? Yeah. Because no one told me shit about the Mucinex situation, and there I was, emailing my Screenwriting 1 professor about the irony of using a software called “Final Draft” to write my screenplay’s rough draft (not even clever. Not even clever.)

Then I thought about it more critically. Of course this happens now. Of course – that’s what they want you to think. They want you to think, “no one told me shit about the Mucinex situation, no one told me shit about the Mucinex situation, go RFK, boo antidepressants.”

To this I say, no.

No. If this is the America we’re faced with in the year of our Lord 2025, an America where we’re expected to surrender our NDRIs over one measly Mucinex-induced fit of hysteria, then we have to face it head-on. RFK and his soon-to-be-revealed worm farm are trying to scare you into backing away from your hard-earned, well-deserved meds. You did not go through Spotify Wrapped after Spotify Wrapped with “Funeral” by Phoebe Bridgers in your top 5 just to stop taking your antidepressants over a cough!

Resist. Stand up for your rights, one Mucinex high at a time <3
articles.name: Mandy

articles.title: Hey! My Friend Over There, Dingus Dorkus, Thinks You’re Cute
articles.description: Sometimes your crush is really your pimp. Cause there are no crueler words than “I think you would really like my friend over there.”
articles.content:
Like a biblical ray of sunshine struck your phone, a text from your crush. Yes! I would love to go to a party with your friends… in fact, I would love nothing more. And then we can hang out the whole night, and talk, and laugh, and kiss a little bit, and fall in love, and marry, and buy a Victorian fixer-upper home, and a few dogs, and live happily ever after.

But sometimes your crush is really your pimp. Cause there are no crueler words than “I think you would really like my friend over there.”

The friend is never nor/mal. They always have jacked-up eyeliner. A tooth waiting to get snagged on any loose-fitting clothing. Incurable halitosis. When someone tries to set you up with a friend, odds are that person is a homeschooler, hellbent on proving the statistics saying they’re “unsocialized” wrong. In other words, the friend is Dingus Dorkus.

So maybe you go sit next to Dingus Dorkus for a while. I mean, it’s only polite. They make sure you’re aware this is one of their first “drinking parties.”Sigh. You could just say “party,” you know? They share the big things happening in their life with you; tap recital is next weekend! I guess it makes sense that they would do the tuxedo t-shirt of dance.

But after a while, chopping it up with Dorkus turns from boring to anger-inducing. Because, at the end of the day, the shadiest thing someone can do is set you up with their weird friend. Why do you think I would fuck with finger-guns incarnate over there? How can I date someone who would ask, “Can I Haz Cheeseburger?” when I take shawty to Shake Shack? What about me makes you think I also fucking loveeeee cosplay? All this time with Dingus Dorkus really makes a girl look inward.

And that’s the sad truth of it. Because after the anger of being set up with someone who has a Twenty One Pilots tattoo subsides, you’re left with the realization that Dingus Dorkus is probably the nicest person at this party.

But you’re still not gonna hit tho. Sorry Dingy.
articles.name: Maggie McNeir

articles.title: DJ Trump Proposes Poppers Tariff, Sparks Gay Outrage
articles.description: Gays took the Capitol by storm, armed only with $7 iced lattes, what was left of their poppers stash, and a dream.
articles.content:
January 6, 2025—A mere fortnight before DJ Trump’s tragic second inauguration, gays took the Capitol by storm, armed only with $7 iced lattes, what was left of their poppers stash, and a dream. Now why would they do that, you ask? Storming the Capitol is tired and overdone—we saw how it went the first time. But if hordes of gun-toting, flag-waving Republicans can cause such a ruckus, then surely the gays could do them one better. Switch out those Trump Pride flags for Twink Pride flags and ditch the guns for meticulously rehearsed runway walks (right into the chamber). This time there was a battle worth fighting.

At the time of DJ Trump’s election, he made—as many politicians do—an abundance of false promises. Normally, I wouldn’t be too concerned about such empty words, the wishful “thinking” of what some “people” like to call our “president.” But this time something felt different. He spoke clearly (huh?) and with eloquence (say what?), and I started to think... could he really be serious this time? Could he really be trying to pry poppers from the hands of the plethora of Troye Sivan look-alikes who were soon to grace the Capitol’s steps? I was getting a little bit scared this time. Not for myself, mind you, but for any of my dear friends who desperately want, who desperately NEED to feel the rush.

I sometimes wonder about what good poppers could do for the Trump administration. If someone were to give RFK Jr. a little sniff, would his brain worm issue be sorted out? If Mitch McConnell had cracked open the bottle in 2016, would he have been able to keep his eyes open on the Senate floor? If JD Vance had... well, actually, we all know that’s nothing new for him.

Nonetheless, this is not only an attack on the LGBTQ+ community but detrimental to the foundation of our nation’s political, diplomatic, and constitutional integrity.

Just give the gays what they want!! If they won’t be able to pop the question soon, then we should at least let them keep their poppers.
articles.name: Maya Bride

articles.title: Secretly Microdosing My Boyfriend With Estrogen: A Bi Girl’s Wet Dream
articles.description: I love my boyfriend. But hear me out. Ever since I started slipping estrogen pills into my boyfriend's morning coffee, life has been better
articles.content:
Let’s be clear, I love my boyfriend. But hear me out. Ever since I started slipping estrogen pills into my boyfriend's morning coffee, life has been better.

Some people may say it's “highly questionable” or even “unethical”, but this man gave up his 5-in-1 shampoo-body wash-face scrub-toothpaste-engine oil for a 10-step Korean skin care routine. He’s also started telling me my outfits are “deermaxxing dark y2k fairy grungecore” now instead of shrugging when I ask him if the fit eats. The other day, he even suggested we get matching nail polish. Who is this man, and where has he been hiding? Honestly, it’s all good as long as he doesn’t find out. Can’t I just enjoy my femme boyfriend in peace?

(UPDATE: She’s a trans woman now, so I broke up with her. I just can’t see myself actually marrying a woman… eugh! congrats tho diva!)
articles.name: Paige Schwartz

articles.title: Calling Her “Gulf of America” Cause I Respect Trans Names and Pronouns
articles.description: When my dear friend informed me that she would now like to be referred to as "Gulf of America," I didn’t hesitate. I didn’t question it. I didn’t crack a joke about it sounding like a failed geopolitical strategy or a nationalist hellscape jacking itself off. I simply nodded, adjusted my vocabulary, and made a mental note to update my contacts accordingly.
articles.content:
I’m pissed! All my friends claim to be so woke, but there has been a mass case of dead-naming happening! Everywhere I turn, people are still calling my dear friend by her old, outdated name. It's 2025, people! Have we learned nothing?

That’s why, when my dear friend informed me that she would now like to be referred to as "Gulf of America," I didn’t hesitate. I didn’t question it. I didn’t crack a joke about it sounding like a failed geopolitical strategy or a nationalist hellscape jacking itself off. I simply nodded, adjusted my vocabulary, and made a mental note to update my contacts accordingly.

Because that’s what allies do.

Some people—ignorant, outdated relics—might scoff at the idea of a name like Gulf of America. They might ask, “Is she a sovereign body of water? A military operation? A glitch in the AI that generates country music festival names?” But to that, I say: Does it matter?

The Gulf of America is not just a woman—she is a vast and mighty force, a shimmering expanse of identity where the sun sets over freedom itself. When she walks into a room, you don’t just see her—you experience her, like a warm, oil-rich breeze rolling over colonized coastlines.

I know accepting this new name change can be hard. It takes time. It takes effort. It takes updating email signatures, social media accounts, accepting living in an imperialism nightmare, and deciphering autocorrect. But we must remember to hold each other accountable.

In class this week, when the professor called my queen by the wrong name, I saw my chance. I raised my hand and said, “Actually, it’s ‘Gulf of America,’ not ‘Gulf of Mexico.’” My professor was shocked and offended (what happened to that strong BU neoliberalism?) but I stood my ground and refused to complete any of my assignments until all professors stopped deadnaming!

But of course, my radical allyship was met with what can only be described as institutional apathy. I was informed that unless I submitted a 10-page paper on “American commerce through intersex seas” my grades would be significantly impacted. Naturally, I refused.

It’s not about grades, it’s about changing the system—even if that means flunking out of school.

And flunk out I did.

But as I left the campus, defeated but unwavering, something magical happened. A fellow student, someone I barely knew but recognized from their “Woke and Proud” shirt, stopped me. “Hey,” they said, “I saw what you did in class. I just wanted to say, I see you and hear you.”

Like two ships passing through gay waters in the night, we parted ways. But I leave these Rhett-infested waters knowing that I stood up for what I believe in. And somewhere, somehow, somebody out there will always hold space for me and the “Gulf of America.”
articles.name: Abbie Garretson

articles.title: I Started A Polycule and Permanently Work At A Renaissance Fair: My Story
articles.description: I unshackled myself from the confines of societal norms and an ever growing totalitarian state and started a queer non-platonic low-committal eight person polycule, and I joined a traveling renaissance fair.
articles.content:
Raymond A. Mungo was a loud and proud student activist at this very institution in the 1960s. Many may not know that BU was considered the Berkeley of the East by people during the 60s because of the widespread and unified efforts to protest the Vietnam War, protests led by Mungo.

But after 4 long, hard years of fighting the establishment, Mungo eventually just started a commune in Vermont. I mean, what is more anti-establishment than removing yourself from society and living by your own means.

So that is what I did, I unshackled myself from the confines of societal norms and an ever-growing totalitarian state and started a queer non-platonic low-committal eight-person polycule, and I joined a traveling renaissance fair.

In a ren fair I can be a knave, a scoundrel, a jester. Return back to the past, to an unrestrained form of my humanity, and simply be silly and whimsical. Why worry about modern problems, like having a dictator for a president, when I can wear a pink and green motley and hop around with joy as I humiliate myself for other’s entertainment? I mean I already do that now, why not do it at a ren fair.

Now if it wasn’t obvious by my motley and silly aura, I am a jester. I prance, frolic, skedaddle around the fair and publicly humiliate myself. I found that my time as a film major helped me maximize my potential in this role. The truest and rawest form of my humanity can only be released through unadulterated jestering. I have seen the universe, or whatever cosmic being exists out there, reach out to me and tickle my soul, something I never felt in society. All through jestering.

At this ren fair I have found many fair ladies and they/them to the point that I have created a queer non-platonic low-committal eight-person polycule. This radical reorganization of the family unit fundamentally undermines societal norms. My polycule consists of a mage, a candle maker, a couple knights, two non-binaries named Sock, a nobleman cheating on his wife, and Alice. This queer non-platonic low-committal eight-person polycule, perchance, is more authentic and radical than any of Marx’s work.

I understand the dichotomy of the traditional renaissance faire and my revolutionary love life, but when egg prices are this high one must look back at the past and reinvent one's life as they know it. I am simultaneously challenging the capitalist, patriarchal society as well as simply reclaiming LARPing for the cool and indie people.
articles.name: Marissa Gilbert

articles.title: Board of Trustees Reject Divestment Because War is “Just Soooooo Profitable!”
articles.description: As you all know, Gilliam has overwritten the previous democratic review process to bring this petition straight to the executive committee. She's quoted saying "The sooner we make a decision, the sooner we can get these extremist kids out of our hair"
articles.content:
BOSTON, MASS. – As the Israeli genocide continues to ravage Palestine, and as Boston University students continue to call for divestment from ethnic cleansing, there comes a window into the cryptic inner mechanisms of our current administration.

Pinky Toe reporters have uncovered a recording of the Executive Committee of BU’s Board of Trustees meeting on the divestment petition submitted by two student organizations. Only a few voices can be heard, but speakers and a transcript of all intelligible dialogue are identified below.

OUR CAST OF CHARACTERS, IN ORDER OF APPEARANCE:

Melissa Gilliam - President of Boston University

Ruth Moorman - Chair of the Advisory Committee on Socially Responsible Investing (ACSRI)

Ahmass Fakahany - Chair of the Board of Trustees

Cynthia Cohen - Vice Chair of the Board of Trustees

Malek Sukkar - Vice Chair of the Board of Trustees

[START RECORDING]

Gilliam: As you all know, I have overwritten the previous democratic review process to bring this petition straight to the executive committee. The sooner we make a decision, the sooner we can get these extremist kids out of our hair.

Moorman: Honestly, it’s embarrassing that they submitted anything in the first place. My committee is completely useless and they should know that. We didn’t divest from commercial firearms after Sandy Hook, why would we divest from actual weapons manufacturers?

Fakahany: I’m sorry you’ve had to deal with this, Ruth. It’s just such a mess. I’m sure your inbox has been flooded with more emails than the so-called “number of murdered children!”

[SCATTERED LAUGHTER]

Gilliam: It’s so funny they still think we care about ethics. I know our students aren’t dumb, but they sure act like it sometimes.

Cohen: The admissions people always let a couple of duds slip through. Now that Trump has canceled DEI, we can finally filter the riffraff out of our student body.

Sukkar: Right? We can’t divest from everything complicit in war–that’s half of our whole portfolio. It’s where all the money is right now! Oh man, it’s almost like American capitalism is built off war, violence, and imperialism or something.

Fakahany: Yeah, we have money in Lockheed Martin, Boeing, General Dynamics, RTX, Honeywell, Raytheon, Caterpillar, Northrop Grumman … [UNINTELLIGIBLE FOR 5 MINUTES AND 12 SECONDS] … Leidos, Peraton, SAIC, Ball, Lumen–

Gilliam: Yes, yes, Ahmass. We can just look up military manufacturers, you don’t have to list every single one you have memorized. It’s okay if students get upset, we can just tell them to engage in respectful discourse and emphasize academic freedom again.

Moorman: I wish we could tell them to lay down in the middle of Comm Ave and get run over and suffer and die.

[LAUGHTER]

Moorman: No, I’m serious.

[EXTENDED SILENCE]

Gilliam: Ruth, don’t say that. We have standards as good little neoliberals. You have to say “God will do what is right” and hope someone strikes them down.

Cohen: Anyway, we’re all voting no to divestment, right? These are the biggest returns we’ve seen in decades - God, we got so lucky with timing! War is just soooooo profitable, we have to keep it up!

Sukkar: We should also shut down all avenues of negotiation and tell them the endowment isn’t political. That’ll really grind their gears and give them no choice but to shut up, because they have no actual power like they would at other universities. We just need to keep silencing them and stay out of the media.

Fakahany: I think they keep forgetting that BU is a private institution–it’s so nice that we don’t have to worry about “the right to free speech” or whatever.

Moorman: While we’re at it, let’s also make wearing facial coverings grounds for expulsion. No more of those blasted Palestine scarves, I’m sick of seeing them.

Gilliam: Ruth, calm down. I know you’re tired of those radicals, but we aren’t Columbia quite yet!

[LAUGHTER ERUPTS]

[END RECORDING]
