articles.title: I’m Sorry For Ruining Black History Month By Getting Ringworm From Fitrec
articles.description: Everyone, I am so sorry.
articles.content:
Everyone, I am so sorry.

A couple weeks ago now, I was unable to shower after a particular trip to Fitrec. Apparently, other people are unaware that you have to wipe down the machines after you use them. Now I, like a buffoon, had assumed that everyone had the common courtesy to do such a thing, and neglected to wipe down my machine (the humble elliptical) prior to my thirty-three minute high intensity workout.

And I Got RINGWORM.

My two best friends are gorgeous intelligent hilarious Black women, one of which has OCD that often manifests through medical anxiety. This woman also happens to be my roommate. That being said, she was freaked at the thought of me contracting ringworm. I literally would have never had it checked out if I hadn’t shown her and been like “Is that weird? It’s been here for about a week now…” so thank god for that. Immediately, we had to go our for antibacterial laundry detergent and hella Lysol, which she uses to spray me down with after I come back from class.

Ringworm, as some of you may know, is not actually a worm. It is a fungal infection that’s highly contagious and it literally eats your skin. I’ve been romanticizing it by leaning against a doorframe solemnly or looking out the window contemplatively and saying things like “This fungus is eating me alive…” which helps a bit. I’m grateful ringworm doesn’t actually involve worms, because it sounds like such a dog disease where there are actual worms inside you. Nope, it’s just the fungus 😂!

Luckily, we’ve come to a great solution. I live in a big inflatable ball in our South Campus apartment-style dorm! It’s awesome! She opens a special hole to deliver me Goldfish and Mini M&M’s. It’s so easy to hotbox, and I have my Nintendo 3DS in there. I’m fine, trust! Having ringworm isn’t even that bad 😊The fungal spores and I are becoming really tight! They said I might be able to integrate into the mycelial hivemind soon, which I think would be super cool. If they’re eating me alive, why should I be lonely while it happens?

I just have so much white guilt already, I can’t believe I brought such a contagious disease into our house during Black History Month. I’ve made up for this by treating them as much as possible, including venmo transactions with captions such as “Beautiful Risings Goddess” and “Reparations 😞💔”. I think that’ll make up for the actions of the white race as a whole!
articles.name: Ces Lodovico

articles.title: Trump Ordinance Working??? Straight Up Not Feeling Nonbinary These Days
articles.description: One morning I woke up covered in fluid.  Pants? Soaked. Bed? Soaked. My boyfriend? Soaked. What is this mysterious fluid? I wondered to myself. Then I realized: Holy shit– it’s my gender fluid.
articles.content:
Trump Ordinance Working??? Straight Up Not Feeling Nonbinary These Days :/

One morning I woke up covered in fluid. Pants? Soaked. Bed? Soaked. My boyfriend? Soaked.

What is this mysterious fluid? I wondered to myself. Then I realized: Holy shit– it’s my gender fluid.

I tried to mop up as much as I could to save my precious nutrients, but it was no use. I felt… dry. 😞 Suddenly I sat up and checked my phone. I had to get to the bottom of what was going on with me. That’s when I saw it. Trump signed an executive order stating there are only two genders.

I start to spiral. I’ve been nonbinary for so long I don’t even remember what my gender assigned at birth was. I quickly pull down my pants to check what is between my legs and find something so disturbing it’s hard for me to write.

I am completely smooth.

I screamed for a minute straight. This can’t be. Literally how am I supposed to jork it now????

I fall to my knees, pounding the floor with my fists when I realize I need to harden myself. I rise to my feet with a new sense of purpose– a new mission. I have to castrate Donald Trump.

He took my genitalia from me and I must do the same to him. I started out by transferring for my last semester of college to NYU and switching majors to whatever Barron Trump studies. He’s incredibly easy to spot, as I am a million feet tall so my sights are instantly set. I sit next to him in my first lecture and to my surprise he invited me home immediately – seems like a lonely guy tbh. But I’m in and that’s all that matters. I wonder if I should castrate Barron to send a message to Don that I am coming for him, similar to Rosalie from Twilight, but decide against it. Not worth the trauma of having to see his penis.

His invite home only extended to his ginormous New York apartment, but I bided my time. Finally, President’s Day of all days arrived. Perfect. Baby Barron was going home to DC for the weekend and I got the invite to accompany him. I packed my soooootcasee and hopped on the private jet to the white house.

When we got there to my surprise Barron wanted to introduce me to his parents almost immediately. This was going to be easier than I expected 😏. But to my surprise it was because–

What? This can’t be…

I watch as Barron gets down on one knee and proposes to me in front of Donald and Melania. I pretend I am speechless when in actuality I am trying to swallow the vomit I am involuntarily regurgitating into my mouth (guess I still have some sort of fluid in me) and nod my head as if I’m Margaret Qualley in the end of The Substance. It pains me to indicate yes, but I have no choice. My mission is my mission.

That night we go to bed except I stay up watching YouTube videos on how to castrate someone. I probably should have done this earlier but better late than never. When I finally have a good enough grasp on it I know it’s time to strike.

I tip-toe around the white house and find Trump’s room, but when I pull his pants down I’m met with… nothing. What the hell? He is also smooth.

I’m walking back to my room with my head hung in defeat when I stumble upon a trap door. Since my mission was a fail and I have nothing left to lose I go in. That’s when I see it. Oh Em Gee. It’s a giant vat of gender fluid! I can get my nonbinary swagger back!!!!

I craft an elaborate tubing system that would have made the Romans proud and funnel all of the fluid to the aircraft wing and start dropping gender fluid on the entirety of America.

In the morning everyone will wake up nonbinary. God is good. The nonbinary agenda has finally been fulfilled and I can rest easy.
articles.name: Jaclyn DiMatteo

articles.title: Serving Face Down Beacon St. While Listening to Janet Jackson Porn Music on My Way Back From Trader Joe’s
articles.description: I listened to Janet. (Deluxe Edition)Hoooolyyy cow. Who had been hiding this gem from me? It was amazing. But let’s not get ahead of myself. Let me explain a few other things.
articles.content:
‍

Recently, I created a list stacked to the brim of diva gay icons for me to listen to. Paula Abdul, Madonna, Diana Ross, and of course, the icon and legend, Janet Jackson. I started with Control. A fine album indeed. A great start. I then moved on to Rhythm Nation 1814. Wow. Blown away. Insane. I thought for sure that I had reached peak gayness. And then I listened to janet. (Deluxe Edition). Hoooolyyy cow. Who had been hiding this gem from me? It was amazing. But let’s not get ahead of myself. Let me explain a few other things.

‍

My love for Trader Joe’s started at a very young age. I met my best friend Olga Syphil in the second grade (yes, she’s still my best friend even though she planted three hemorrhoids in my anal cavity and five tucked away behind my uvula). We bonded over our love for sugar and her love of cannibalism. However, perhaps the most exciting part of being her friend was the fact that her dad worked at Trader Joe’s. Each time we went to Trader Joe’s we would look to see if he was working that day, and if he was, he would give me a little lollipop. Truly the best thing you could ever receive as an elementary schooler. And thus, I began to connect Trader Joe’s with sweetness and Olga (and Olga with the fresh scent of a roasted human body, seasoned to perfection with the Trader Joe’s Mushroom & Company Multipurpose Umami Seasoning Blend!).

‍

My love for serving face, however, started quite recently. (If you must know, the longer I’ve been single, the more my hate and anger has increased, fueling my love for showing off my face card.)

‍

This brings us to a few weeks ago, when I desperately needed groceries to kick off the beginning of what will surely be a great semester. As I perused through Trader Joe’s, I collected many sweet artifacts and treasures. I bartered with the weak punk-ass wimpy college employee that kindly bagged my gems and made great conversation with me (they definitely truly cared about me—it’s their job) and walked out of god’s gift to Earth with my giant bag of grocery on my shoulder. And then I strolled.

‍

As I strolled, however, I found the weight of the grocery to be difficult. It weighed me down. I could feel the demons beneath the crust and mantle using their divine influence to pull me into the core. So, I had to fight back the only way I knew how. By serving face. And serve face I did. My sharp jawline cut the Control they had on me as my right brow arched so far, creating a The Velvet Rope (Deluxe Edition) between my face card and the geoscience demons. However, as I looked down at my bag, I realized that the demons were also pulling down on my grocery, and as an Empath, I could feel it as well. I was losing this battle. And there was only one thing that could help.

‍

I looked down at my phone and pressed play to continue my first listen-through of janet. (Deluxe Edition). “DJ, make me wet.” Immediately, Janet started to moan and sensually whimper in my ear as Throb, perhaps one of her best songs ever, blasted in my ears. “I can feel your body, pressed against my body, wrap yourself around me, love to feel you throbbin.’” I was empowered. The moaning and throbs trickled down my ears, throbbing through my entire temple (because, after all, that’s what our bodies are), striking great terror into the demons’ minds. They didn’t even stand a chance. “Boom, boom, boom, until noon, noon, noon.” All they got was three big booms and three small noons, and suddenly, I was immediately transported back to my lovely gutted Buswell South Campus apartment with my grocery. Smiling, I sighed and looked up like the manic pixie dream girl I am. I then began to unload my groceries and cook my dinner. And as I had just gotten groceries from Trader Joe’s, I was thankfully eating good that night. I sat down and put my meal all neatly arranged in front of me and dug in. And sure enough, the seven fingers and three breasts of Olga Syphil’s bastardized clone from the year 4673 was seasoned to perfection.

‍
articles.name: Doran Steinfeld

articles.title: Breaking: Reverse Racism Is Real! Beyonce Wins Grammy Over Billie Eilish
articles.description: As many of you may know, everyone’s favorite white girl in baggy clothes was “snubbed” at the grammys recently. In the wake of this absolute tragedy I bring you the latest developments in sociology. According to the highly educated twittershpehere reverse racism has now been proven real!
articles.content:
As many of you may know, everyone’s favorite white girl in baggy clothes was “snubbed” at the grammys recently. In the wake of this absolute tragedy I bring you the latest developments in sociology. According to the highly educated twittershpehere reverse racism has now been proven real! 

A black woman who has won more grammys than anyone else in the world, and been in the music industry for over thirty years, won album of the year over a white woman who's been in the music industry for barely ten. The Recording Academy has obviously not gotten Donald Trump’s memo that DEI is over.
The white woman of our generation, Taylor Swift, also walked away from the Grammys with not a single win. Coincidence? I think not!

 If we ignore the overwhelming evidence from this year’s Grammys as well as history: Sabrina, Chappell, and Lady Gaga all walk away with wins, Beyoncé is the first Black woman to win best country album, and Doechii is one of three black women to ever win best rap album (and let's face it, white people ain't making exceptionally great rap), there’s absolutely no other explanation!
It is time to mobilize the white population of the United States. Start victimizing yourself and compare years of systemic inequality and oppression to small interactions with the people you’ve oppressed and minority groups finally getting their flowers. 

What’s that? They were already doing that? Well then…keep it up guys, you’re already professionals! Well you’re at it, don’t be shy in enforcing that system of BIPOC privilege cause we definitely have that.
articles.name: Aidan Fairchild-Sandoval

articles.title: Watch Out, I Can Ski Now!
articles.description: And they say girls with red hair can’t ski…
articles.content:
And they say girls with red hair can’t ski…

Just kidding, nobody says that. But it was funny to joke that I was defying all odds as I made my merry way down the bunny hills.

I’m from Phoenix, Arizona, so my ass has never graced the ski slopes before. “Lauren, it’s like a sand dune but cold,” my friend Mark joked. 

Now, despite what most East Coasters assume, there IS snow in Northern Arizona. I KNOW what snow is, I just don’t find myself there very often. But this time, I finally cracked my wallet open to take part in a ski trip with friends.

Putting those tight-ass ski boots on and waddling through thick, powdery snow made me feel like a fish out of water. It didn’t help that there were two-foot-tall kids effortlessly whizzing past me in flashy outfits the whole time. No one likes being bested by someone that probably doesn’t even know their multiplication tables yet.

It was really fun to be there though. The mountain was full of characters! Characters #1 and #2: The newly-wed couple. The man was dressed in a full suit, and his new wife wore a long lavender silk dress with a little fur coat on top. You know, proper ski attire for over-the-top obnoxious straight people. I just KNOW their gender reveals are gonna go crazy.

“Think they want a third?” my friend Jonny joked. A little later, we headed to the four person ski lift, and being a group of five, Jonny volunteered to roll solo. Suddenly, right in front of us in line was the couple! Jonny walked up to join them on the lift, when suddenly–

“Could it just be us, please?” They did NOT want a third.

Eventually, when I was able to make my way down a slope without falling, my East Coast friends ditched me and Mark (Californian) to go take on harder slopes, such as Stillness, The Chute, and True Grit. I shuddered at the names alone.

Mark and I were kiki-ing as a duo on the four person ski lift when I realized I had dropped my glove at some point. Luckily, we met Character #3 as we stepped off the lift. She was a small child that pointed at me and yelled, “YOU DROPPED YOUR GLOVE!”

“It’s near pole 5,” her kind-hearted father clarified. So, Mark and I set off on a journey: we were going to meander down the long ass slope in search of my glove. Once we made it to pole 5, I saw it sitting atop a pile of snow and thought, let me get right in there! Bad idea. My ski sunk directly into the snow and suddenly it was like quicksand (I had to put it in Arizona terms.) My every move pushed me down further!

And then Mark swiftly pulled up on the other side of the pole and picked up my glove without breaking a sweat, let alone trapping his entire body under snow. After several long minutes of struggling, I finally managed to pop my skis off and wriggle out of the snow, but getting them back ON while on the downhill slope was another issue.

After we survived that adventure, I checked my phone to see our other three friends had sent a selfie: they were leisurely enjoying a hot chocolate at the Schwendi Hutte at the top of the mountain. Maybe we should have gone with them after all.

Mark and I decided we’d go down the mountain once more– one final hurrah– and then retire back to our cabin two hours early for après-ski. After all, there’s only so much skiing two West-coasters can handle, ESPECIALLY if one of them is a girl with red hair. The odds weren’t in my favor!

Now, I’ve popped my skiing cherry and I’m ready to take on the world. When the city of Boston forgets to salt the sidewalks and they’re covered in ice and sludge, I’m not afraid! I’ll just pop on my skis and flex on these hoes.
articles.name: Lauren Matz

articles.title: Passed By Cause I’m Straight Passing: I Did Something Wrong In a Past Life
articles.description: In my life there are a handful of questions I’ve been stopped and asked about more than I’ve ever been asked out by a beautiful woman, so let me get those out of the way.
articles.content:
In my life there are a handful of questions I’ve been stopped and asked about more than I’ve ever been asked out by a beautiful woman, so let me get those out of the way. 

No, I don’t want to join your Bible study. 

Yes, I’m aware that my collection of cardigans reminds you of your 10th grade English teacher. 

And yeah, I can recite the entirety of Justin’s _Believe_ album, start to finish.

Each fleeting moment I spy a gorgeously gay gay walking past me, I hold my breath, because surely she can tell that I sleep below movie posters of _A League of Their Own_ and _Thelma and Louise_. But alas, no up and down glances, no immediate make out sessions, no chaining me down with carabiners. I’m passed by. 

I don’t want to say it’s my own fault that I’ve built up a brand on par with a mildly tempered southern woman, but I suppose it might be. Except this is simply who I am today, if I want answers, I need to dive deeper. What choice did I make in the past that bundled up this bursting rainbow?

I decided to seek out answers, and as fate would have it, Comm Ave’s straight campus led me to them. Instead of being shoved meeting minutes from the LDS chapter on the street, I was shoved a card for professional help: Paul’s Fortune Telling. 

Late one evening, I crawled down to visit the mysterious fortune teller on Comm Ave, who everyone else similarly seemed to pass by during the day. He would understand me. With a reasonable donation of $30 USD, Paul was ready to read my palm. 

“Ah yes, just as I suspected, curved lines in every which way until one moment and they all became straight,” he pointed to the center of my hand. “You must have squandered something.” I looked down and traced my own finger across what he referred to. Oh god. How could I have never noticed?

“Most of my clients who come to me with these hands attribute their passing qualities to the Second Industrial Revolution, with a cardigan just like that one.” He pointed to my outfit. What? This has to do with the Triangle Shirtwaist Factory?

“It seems as though all domestic traits became permanently sealed inside your soul once the disaster occurred, explaining your current outward appearance today,” detailed the all knowing oracle. 

“But I can trace your lack of straightness to the fact that you were sewing a garment of blues and pinks and purples. How scandalous! Most people have a hard time spotting the early gays because all of the images from that time are grayscale.”

It all made sense now. My soul is closeted inside the 1911 industrial worker version of me.

“Of course, I can recommend listening to Simon de Beauvoir on tape or carrying around a Rosie the Riveter pin, but those largely yield disappointing or pretentious results. I’m afraid you may have to persevere through this condition for the rest of your life.”

And so I have. I will carry on the historic shield glued to my face.

But if you’ve made it this far, and you're into girls, and you see me doing Luda’s verse during Bieber karaoke, just know that those words could all be about you baby ;)
articles.name: Willa Norvell

articles.title: “Why’d You Leave ID In Your Room?” Asks Tired Warren Security Guard To Hoard Of ICE Agents
articles.description: Warren towers security guards are sick and tired of students forgetting their IDs and ICE agents are no exception. Though the ancient ID slide technology is depressing (especially compared to the tap-scan EVERYWHERE ELSE) these security guards do not have it easy, especially in the new age of ICE invasions.
articles.content:
Warren towers security guards are sick and tired of students forgetting their IDs and ICE agents are no exception. Though the ancient ID slide technology is depressing (especially compared to the tap-scan EVERYWHERE ELSE) these security guards do not have it easy, especially in the new age of ICE invasions. 

First and foremost, ICE agents and BU students look almost identical. Clunky black outfits are not just the stylish option for the agents, but also the preferred day-off look for the ex-emo kids that make up all of COM. How are the security guards supposed to differentiate a hoard of intoxicated teenagers versus a hoard of equally intoxicated 40 year old Trump supporters? 

Warren tower’s security guard Cekure Gward (pronounced secure guard) said “I remember the ICE agents from the 80’s, their outfits were much more recognizable. This job isn’t what it used to be. I’m going to have to retire soon if I keep letting those agents in. You know what they say, 64 strikes and your out!” 

Gward has been the cause of 63 prior ICE invasions on campus. If Gward’s actions continue, the impacts that the ICE agents have on campus may become detrimental. 

Not only do the ICE agents pose a threat to students and staff, but the construction on Warren Towers simply cannot support the weight of an extended ICE group. For those who have been misinformed, an official full ICE team is accompanied by an entire scuba diving team (in case an immigrant tries to swim across the charles and the normal ICE members forgot their bathing suits), personal chefs to meet the energy-providing vegan gluten free diet of the agents, and small instrumental ghoulish entities that provide an exhilarating soundtrack to the gang’s misdeeds. With the scuba divers, chefs, and ghouls alike, Warren’s weight capacity may be at risk. 

In a similar sense, the agents pose a threat to the building’s ancient plumbing. If security guards continue to let these oversized groups into Warren towers, not only do we risk deportation of our dear friends, but also the internal integrity of the Towers. Imagine the chefs cook up some bad immigrant for the ICE agents, then each of them will require an entire floor’s bathroom and override the pipe system causing explosive bursts. 

According to ICE agent 093 “Yeah, I think my favorite part about being on the team is community… I remember one time after we infiltrated that aquarium we swam with the dolphins.” 
Not only do the agents get in the way of students craving that dining hall gruel, but the agents also pose a serious carcinogenic threat to student health. Fact: Both hotdogs and cigarettes are classified as group 1 carcinogens, however a hotdog takes 36 minutes off of your life while a cigarette only takes off 20. We know that BU students have spent a long time cultivating a healthy relationship with their nicotine, averaging -1 hr off their life per day. But when we add the ICE agent hotdog eating fee into the equation, student’s risk shortening their lives up to 2 weeks. During an ICE raid, agents will forcefully make arrests in which they show victims really un-funny instagram reels, read aloud texts, and impose a hotdog eating tax. If BU students aren’t getting their normal dosage of cigarettes but are instead getting replaced with hotdogs, the current student body may not make it to graduation.

It would be great to support the community of ICE agents at Warren Towers, but BU’s team of security guards does not get paid enough to work around the ICE agent’s lack of student IDs. If the ICE agents REALLY need to come and wreck our plumbing, structural integrity and human relationships, then they can enroll at the university and pay for an ID like everyone else.

articles.title: “No Fats, No Fems, No FDA” The Republicans Are Taking Over Grindr!
articles.description:
Dear Diary, 

	 Today was a normal day. I woke up, went to class, pretended to take notes when I was actually texting my mom about the way my professor's bald head was creating a glare onto the table. A glare so fierce it was burning a hole into the table.
articles.content:
Dear Diary, Today was a normal day. I woke up, went to class, pretended to take notes when I was actually texting my mom about the way my professor's bald head was creating a glare onto the table. A glare so fierce it was burning a hole into the table.

Speaking of burning holes: can we talk about how the republicans have been taking over Grindr? It all started after big seesta general lost the election. The app in which I trolled grown men and where I got the hottest new gossip was promoting an extremely conservative agenda. All of the he/they baristas suddenly turned into faceless profiles saying they’re going to end the woke mob! Oh dearest diary, I was so shocked! I was so shocked that I sent an email to the Grindr HQ and received an auto reply stating that RFK had acquired all of Grindr and they’re going to make major changes. First one being that all “DL masc4masc” profiles had priority access to not only the Cowboy Carter Tour, but also to Dragcon 2025! How dare Grindr allow those shirtless profiles to have access when they can’t even appreciate the opulence of Joella’s episode 4 look? It’s been especially hard since they’ve let the Log Cabin republicans take ownership of the FDA (which surprisingly is also owned by Grindr). They’re replacing all the nutrition labels on my low fat yogurt with the word “Stats?” and “Looking?” Oh Mamala Harris please come back and save Grindr! Please big seesta general we need you as bad as ever! The republican DL’s have become as picky as ever. Before, they just said “no fats, no fems” but now they’re blocking you if you even mention that you eat processed foods! They’ve even fired Katya from the Grindr podcast and replaced her with the insurrection grandma. Which honestly is a change I’m ok with but I feel bad for that haggard old woman (Katya).

Please save my favorite app.

articles.title: Free Top Surgery? This Weather Froze My Tits Off
articles.description: Trans rights and healthcare are under attack in the United States, not to mention the enormous costs trans healthcare can include in places where it is legal.  If you’re one of the many trans folks struggling to access or afford top surgery, take a trip up north to experience a no-cost uniquely New England-based solution.  Let the wintery weather freeze your tits right off!
articles.content:
Trans rights and healthcare are under attack in the United States, not to mention the enormous costs trans healthcare can include in places where it is legal.  If you’re one of the many trans folks struggling to access or afford top surgery, take a trip up north to experience a no-cost uniquely New England-based solution.  Let the wintery weather freeze your tits right off!

Now, you know I wouldn’t recommend something to all you faithful Pinky readers if I didn’t know it worked, so take my testimony as proof: it happened to me!  One minute, I was walking down Comm Ave with the back problems of a well-endowed bad bitch, and the next, I was hit with a gust of wind so goddamn cold it froze my tits straight off!  They fell to the ground and shriveled into teeny tiny remnants of what they once were, much like the Democratic party’s balls every time trans rights came up during the election.  As I watched my frozen tits roll weakly into the gutter, I was inspired. I realized I had to share my newfound freedom with the rest of the world who doesn’t experience nip-numbing temperatures as a normal part of their everyday life.

Here’s my foolproof method for how you, too, can ditch your double D’s for free via freezing.  Step into your best recreation of the New England man uniform (work boots, poorly-fitting jeans, and a stained hoodie that’s so old it’s holding on for dear life) and find yourself a good wind tunnel.  This is best done with an iced coffee in hand, to replace the energy you’ll lose from your tits (it’s science).  Then, simply stand with your arms out, and wait for the winter wind to hit you square in the chest.  Don’t let the cold burn deter you!  The numbness will set in in a few minutes anyways, and then it’ll be nothing.  And that’s it!  The New England wind is so nippy, it’ll have your nips jumping ship!

You’re probably asking yourself if this method is safe.  Allow me to assure you: it’s free.

New England weather is known for its extremes.  Our winters can go from being as frigid as Melania Trump watching a small child cry for its mother to as mild as the salsa at your favorite gentrified taqueria in a day.  So, be sure to check the weather when you plan your trip so that you can experience those blustery wind blasts that will blow your boobs right into oblivion!  Remember, much like the “debate” on trans rights, New England weather has no middle ground.

So come freeze your tits off, and at no cost to you, your chest can be flatter than the promises of corporations to support the LGBTQ+ community fell once Trump took office!
articles.name: Emma Santos

articles.title: Situationship Or Psychosis?
articles.description:
You’re talking to a man. And then the horrors begin. 

Can a girl really be blamed for her homicidal tendencies when she is denied the privilege of a “what are we?” conversation?

Is it really so bad that you dream of shrinking said man down to a quarter of an inch —like in the 1989 American science fiction comedy film Honey, I Shrunk the Kids— and putting him in a jar so you can shake it whenever he irritates you?
articles.content:
You’re talking to a man. And then the horrors begin. 

Can a girl really be blamed for her homicidal tendencies when she is denied the privilege of a “what are we?” conversation?

Is it really so bad that you dream of shrinking said man down to a quarter of an inch —like in the 1989 American science fiction comedy film Honey, I Shrunk the Kids— and putting him in a jar so you can shake it whenever he irritates you?

Maybe you’re being crazy. Maybe he doesn’t actually touch your thigh when he’s talking to you, and you might’ve imagined him whispering compliments into your ear even with others around.

Oh yeah! You totally dreamed hooking up that one time… and that other time… and also last week…

You don’t know who you’re becoming. The voices are becoming too loud. There is a darkness that surrounds you. “I think we’re moving too fast,” haunts your dreams. You hear “I thought we were just having fun” whenever the wind blows.

Nothing feels real anymore and you have no clue what to do. It almost feels impossible the way you keep his name in your mouth (pause). But why does he only insist on seeing you after dark? The fast and loose flirting could give anyone whiplash. This is torture. Something has got to give.

He has to pay, the voices say one morning. He can’t keep getting away with this. You begin to agree with them. But however will he understand the consequences of his own actions?

The voices in your head, in all honesty, have become more helpful than friends, a therapist, or any antipsychotic medications. They soothe you and help you realize your true potential.

You must make it so he can never do this to any girl again. His soul is impure. We need to purify it.

What a great idea, voices! We must cleanse the Earth of his sins.

He plays right into your trap one night. He never even sees it coming. The heavy snowfall, a walk in the Commons. 

How romantic. The voices are almost screaming. But no matter, you just grip his hand tighter and smile even wider.

No one even hears him scream. How unfortunate, the voices say as his blood stains the white snow.

“He ruins everything,” you say back, pulling him towards the frozen pond. It’s easy to break through the layer of ice. It’s easy to hack into his bones. It’s easy to drop chunks of him into the water one by one, watching them sink to the bottom. They’ll come back up eventually, but at least no one will see the pieces of him until everything melts. 

And that will take weeks, the voices hum with delight.

You don’t drop everything though. You take a finger, and put it in a jar. It’s almost gray now from the cold. Pure enough. Detached from him.

There’s a new voice now. It sounds strangely familiar. And every time it speaks, you shake the jar as hard as you can.tf

Situationships, ha ha! They can drive you pretty crazy!
articles.name: Ogenna Oraedu

articles.title: My Temu Rose Toy Overheated And Set Off The Fire Alarm
articles.description: I will be honest, no one found out it was me THANK GOD.
articles.content:
My Temu Rose Toy Set Off the Warren Towers Fire Alarm  


Rachel Stern 


BZZZ.. BZZZZZZ! 


Have I ever mentioned that I hate the pulse setting? Who wants to be edged when they are masturbating alone? I am just trying to get a quickie between classes since I have a raging headache and pent-up academic frustration. My situationship is busy snapping someone else, my ex isn’t easily accessible, and all I have is my Temu rose toy. Everyone told me how incredible this thing was… and honestly, it's not all that. BUT it gets the job done. 


After fumbling around and cursing, I finally get the setting to change. I should never trust a sex toy made by Temu, the buttons barely work and then I’m stuck even more annoyed than when I started! 


SHIT, FUCK, FINALLY


I feel warmth between my legs, I swear I’m about to.. 


WAIT WHAT THE FUCK 


I look down to see that it isn’t hot cum soaking my legs, but SMOKE! 


I get violent war flashbacks to that time I told my ex I was into temperature play, just for him to stick an ice cube in me and give me frostbite. That was kind of like this but if you turned the temperature up to 102 instead. 


I throw the Temu rose toy on the floor, urgently trying to find Neosporin for my new burn. It is then that I realize the smoke is rising. And then I hear it, that dreadful Warren Towers warning alarm THAT NEVER STOPS. YOU WOULD THINK IF THE PLACE WAS GONNA GO UP IN FLAMES WE WOULD ALL BE DEAD BY THE END OF THE WARNING SIGNAL. 


“There is an emergency in the building. Please wait to hear a beep for evacuation.”


I must think fast, I can not let the firefighters see this. What if they are hot and hunky like in the porn video I was watching?? I throw the rose toy into my roommate's nasty molding tea kettle she hasn’t washed in weeks, get my nearest pair of pants on, and waddle out of my room with burns on my legs feeling alarmed. 


I will be honest, no one found out it was me THANK GOD. But, I forgot I put the rose toe in the kettle… and I think my roommate just made tea.
articles.name: Rachel Stern

articles.title: I’m Getting Kicked Out Of The Pinky Toe Because Of DEI BAN?? HIStory: pt.2
articles.description: When I joined the Pinky Toe, things were good. Sleepy Joe was in office, Kamala was campaigning her way through fall, and I thought I was making waves.
articles.content:
When I joined the Pinky Toe, things were good. Sleepy Joe was in office, Kamala was campaigning her way through fall, and I thought I was making waves. I’ll be honest, I was riding the high of my acceptance. I set off to prove that straight men can (also) do it. I remember sitting down at Trident Bookstore after perusing my favorite authors, Angela Davis and bell hooks, ordering a matcha latte with strawberry syrup, and putting my pen to paper. The words flowed in waves, like feminism, and landed perfectly on the page, as I undid centuries of patriarchal rule over women and queer people (We’re sorry🙏). 

	But now, all of this is in danger. As I watched the election, all I could think about was the oppressed communities who would be affected by this (yeah that’s right, im woke and intersectional). But more importantly, I thought about us, the straight cis het men. All the progress that our community had made for ages and ages. We accepted that others had feelings, we finally understood that it was ok to cry (which I totally did on election night), we finally began to really understand. 

With DEI under crosshairs of the impending Tump administration, I knew what it meant. It meant that we would no longer occupy- I mean represent ourselves within queer/feminist spaces.  I hoped that in the days between the election, one of the straightest men of all time could save us. He, and only he, could enshrine DEI to preserve. Joe Biden. Instead tho, he just preemptively pardoned his family and, as any straight white cis-het man in his position would do, funded Israel. So when Donald came into office and basically deleted DEI, I knew it was over for me, a minority of every kind in the Pinky Toe (straight, male, Latino and Asian). Now that DEI is done, and it’s only a matter of time before BU removes the HTC, a huge blow has been dished out to the straight man community, specifically me cuz I'm being kicked out of Pinky Teo too.

I was lucky to arrive at the Pinky toe when I did. Brat summer was lowkey still going, the leaves were changing colors, me still wide eyed and dreaming of us straights showing that we have changed. Us men deserve to read and be in the Pinky Toe aren’t unqualified; we get your humor too! We secretly love watching clips of Caleb Heron, we also have Lady gaga on our gym playlists, and yes we can also do funny campy humor. 

So to all (5) the straight male readers who read my work, thank you, and our day will come.

It’s been real, Martín (he/him/his)
articles.name: Martin Akamine

articles.title: Bird Flu? Um Yeah, They do That
articles.description: It’s weird. I keep hearing people completely freaking out but whenever I try to find out what’s causing the ruckus, they look at me funny and say “The Bird Flu.”
articles.content:
It’s weird. I keep hearing people completely freaking out but whenever I try to find out what’s causing the ruckus, they look at me funny and say “The Bird Flu.”

	But like um yeah, they do that?

	Well, not all birds do I suppose. According to my research, there are around 60 species of flightless birds. You have ostriches, penguins, kiwis. Domesticated chickens are unable to fly for extended periods of time, so I’m still unsure if they would fall under these people’s worries. 

	And their bodies are just built like that. They have hollow bones! I must assume the dislike of it comes from their own personal agenda: a hatred of woodwind instruments. Because yeah, they did make flutes out of bird bones once upon a time, and they were cool! But stop fretting, if they’re flying, the bones remain in their bodies and we don’t have to deal with that horrendous music. You’re safe as long as Bird Flu stays around.

	In my personal opinion, I don’t think we should be worried about this “The Bird Flu.” They can’t help flying more than a frat brother can’t help screaming into a party “if you’re not a brother or sleeping with a brother, GET OUT.” It’s just the way the world works. Ultimately, I think there should be more “bird flu.” Honestly, let’s add more animals into the mix and accept flying squirrel flu. Hell, bats can fly too! A bat flu would be totally awesome.

	And don’t even get me started on the illiteracy rate of the US. They keep misspelling “bird flew.” It’s honestly kinda embarrassing for them. Don’t talk about a subject you know nothing about.
articles.name: Mirna Benavente

articles.title: Trump announced DEI is being reinstated and renamed to “Donald and Elon Intercourse”
articles.description: “You’re so pretty,” Donald whispers in my ear. He whispers it so slowly and gently. In an image, it would be depicted by a beautiful flower being carefully tilted by a gentle breeze. My heart is rushing.
articles.content:
Trump announced DEI is being reinstated and renamed to Donald and Elon Intercourse.

PUBLISHING THIS ANONYMOUSLY 

From Elon’s POV:

Do you think he thinks about me like how I think about him? How often  I think about him? I wish I were Santa Claus so it isn’t considered “weird” when I watch him when he’s sleeping. How I know he’s awake. Certainly how I know if he’s been bad or good. I get these feelings when I see him. Feelings I’ve never felt for a man before. Confusing feelings. Let me describe this in detail. When I see him I get all hot. I forget whatever I was thinking about. A few times I have looked down to see my little piggy perking up. I know Trump gets those.. He tells me all about these models. He sleeps around a lot. Did you know Barron isn’t Melania’s?? Anyways, he tells me about when his little piggy perks up. I think he calls them insurrections. I wonder if he gets them when he sees me.

** In woeful manhattan **

“Hey there little mama,” Trump says.

“Hehe hey,” I say as I kick my feet.

“Do you wanna play MarioCart with me?” Trump asks.

“You know I do!” I unintentionally say in a high-pitched squeal.

We race our way up the stairs. I don't know if it was on purpose or not but, the back of his hand slightly skimmed my thigh. I don’t know what to think when he does stuff like this. Maybe it’s just wishful thinking. I don't know. I don't know. I just.. just wish it were obvious. Last week I asked if he wanted to ride my rocket ship.. He called the presidential helicopter to take us to space x. 

“Do you want the bare remote controller or the steering wheel one?” Donny asks me.

He genuinely cares about my feelings. I think this is a good sign. I stumble over my words, but I finally get out

“Whichever.” 

I’d definitely be submissive. He take the wheel and says

“Great cause I was gonna take this one either way.”

We play for about ten minutes until I get a text that Dean Withers tweeted on X. I screech. This damn boy is so annoying. Delete account, I click. Donald looks over and asks me if I am okay. I tell him that I wish the libs would just stop trying. He comforts me. He puts one hand on my back and rubs it gently. I look down to see him caressing my lower thigh. His hand slowly getting higher and higher. I can feel his body slowly press up against mine and I can feel his breath getting heavier. 

“You’re so pretty,” Donald whispers in my ear. He whispers it so slowly and gently. In an image, it would be depicted by a beautiful flower being carefully tilted by a gentle breeze. My heart is rushing. 

“I really want you” He follows with. My heart is pounding so fast. I can hardly breathe. I realize I have an insurrection. I decided to put my hands on him. I run them up and down his spine. I feel him perk up. I notice his little piggy has perked up too. He lays me down on the floor pushing the remotes out of the way. The gold plated floors chill my back as he aggressively takes off my shirt. Finally, I know he feels the same. He grabs his phone and turns on his sex playlist.



He connects it to the speaker and gets to business. He rips off my belt. What he does next.. so unholy that christians everywhere should be counting their blessings that he didn't put his hand on the bible during his inauguration. He takes my belt, loops one side through the buckle, puts my hands on either side of this belt which is now shaped like an 8, and tightens it. Now that he has fashioned my belt as handcuffs around my wrists I know for sure I was right about being a sub. I was so right. I honestly didn't expect to be this right. I cannot believe this is about to happen. 

“It is time. I’m gonna do it,” Donny Wonny announced. He slips it in. 

Writers note: Being accepted to Boston University to write smut about Donald Trump and Elon Musk is deeply saddening. I am not writing this in detail. We are skipping to the end.

After about 

He stands up and goes to eat a twinkie. He looks so good eating that twinkie. I stand up and ask him where the bathroom is. He told me to keep walking until I found it. 
“Hehe!” I giggle. He is so cute and funny and he makes me wanna prance around. 


I am ending this here.

articles.title: Ferment With Me! Sealing Myself In An Airtight Jar Filled With Pickle Brine
articles.description: I thought about a spa day or a nice massage but then it came to me. What could be more relaxing than a bubbly, dill-infused fermentation period!
articles.content:
Hey what’s up you guys! *enthusiastic influencer gesturing* Over the last few weeks we’ve had a depressing election, a  second wave of midterms, and I lost my airpods, so you could say I’ve been feeling low. So I decided it was time for a little self-care day. Mental. Health. Matters. For men too. But they’re getting a lot of publicity about that recently so lets hold space for me instead.

I thought about a spa day or a nice massage but then it came to me. What could be more relaxing than a bubbly, dill-infused fermentation period! Instructions on this recipe say to begin with a nice mason jar that’s clear enough to check on your progress. This week I’ll be using the BUild lab as my container of choice! It’s transparent and clearly labeled so i wont get lost in the fridge.

Next, I’ll be using a brining liquid of 1 part water, 1 part vinegar, blah blah blah fuck this recipe why are you telling me what to do?? Today I’ll be adding 400 litres of Charles River water, however much salt is on the sidewalks, and battery acid from all the smoke detectors across campus because I like a pickle with a real sour bite. And of course some fresh dill!

As I slip into the green, cold, somewhat chunky (I think the batteries were expired) I feel an instant wave of relaxation wash over me. I can feel healing properties of mercury seeping into me, the gut-biome-fluencer on wellness-tok was telling me all about them. I sink to the bottom and feel the dill tickle my toes and the soothing salt exfoliation begin eroding my bunions away.

Yes. I’m sure. This is exactly what I needed. I feel better already. I paddle through the chartreuse colored waves and seal the lab up. Air would hinder the fermentation process and make me a floppy, acrid, spoiled mess.

Once I get bubbly and the green seeps into my skin enough to make me sour yet refreshingly sharp and witty, take me out and enjoy on a nice juicy burger, gluten free tuna melt, fruit roll up with chamoy, or just maybe a sunny Boston day.

articles.title: Why I Call My Non-Binary Friends "They/Them Thon Thinaries
articles.description: They do make a mean macchiato, which might be a harmful stereotype towards non-binary folk, however let's all be honest: we want the blue haired baddie with ten million pins on their apron to make our peppermint mocha this fine holiday season.
articles.content:
STARBUCKS UNDER WARREN TOWERS- So essentially, I have a Non-Binary friend who I like to call (as I coined it) a “They them thon thinarie”
	Honestly, I don’t know why we think it’s so funny. But they do make a mean macchiato, which might be a harmful stereotype towards non-binary folk, however let's all be honest: we want the blue haired baddie with ten million pins on their apron to make our peppermint mocha this fine holiday season.
	Some from the “woke agenda” would say that referring to my friend as a “they them thon thinary” could possibly hurt their feelings, but I don’t think that my friend is too offended with what I say about them because they’re too busy shopping for the latest thrifted finds at the goodwill next to Canes and absolutely mogging me with their latest baby tee.
	Anyways, my peppermint mocha is ready and that “Senorita Awesome” lady from Scream Queens just walked in and DO NOT want to deal with her bullshit right now.

Goodbye for now,
Anne Ally

articles.title: Forward My Mail To Tatte: My Plan To Meet Zendaya
articles.description: After 3 days of camping out, eating only stale croissants and diluted coffee while missing classes, I had to call it quits. Why would Zendaya ever be on a street as dumb as Beacon? I had to leave for my own sake. That and the employees finally found me and ran me out with a broom like a raccoon.
articles.content:
I check X Twitter before I head to class, as one does, when I’m confronted by set photos and videos of a movie. Nothing new, people love to share pictures of irrelevant movies and whatnot. But what really got my attention was the caption:

Robert Pattinson and Zendaya Spotted filming their new movie in Boston

But wait, I’m in Boston. I could run into Edward himself! Or even better, Ms. Rocky Blue herself! Yet how could I build a genuine pre-planned casual run-in with her? She’s a star and I’m but a lowly college students with no money, no prospects, and a burden to my parents.

Yet as I continue to scroll, I come across another video of Zendaya in Boston. As I analyze the video, I see the restaurant she’s at: Tatte. Of course, Zandaya fucking loves a good Tatte run. She ate there with her – at the time – new boyfriend Tom Holland last time she filmed in town.

With that in mind, I packed my bags and took residency at my nearest Tatte, a 5 minute walk from my dorm on Beacon St. I set up hidden cameras everywhere and clicked between them like I was playing a game of Five Nights at Freddy’s. Only it was more sadistic since there was no Foxy in sight.

Yet after 3 days of camping out, eating only stale croissants and diluted coffee while missing classes, I had to call it quits. Why would Zendaya ever be on a street as dumb as Beacon? I had to leave for my own sake. That and the employees finally found me and ran me out with a broom like a raccoon.

As I did what essentially felt like a walk of shame back to my dorm, I had an epiphany – Celebrities are nothing more than people. They struggle to find the hooks on the back of their bras just like me. These parasocial relationships we’ve developed with certain famous people are a disease and we have to be more conscious about how we treat people. In the end, I don’t actually mind that Zendaya never showed up because I was able to keep my dignity as a person and-

Roomie: “Y’know, Zendaya was shooting scenes in the building across the street from our dorm.”

Y’know, there’s another Tatte by Fenway Target that I can camp out in…
articles.name: Mirna Benavente

articles.title: Spots on! The Freckles I Hide Behind Everyday
articles.description: Oh how they laugh, oh how they cry. “Look at you! Spread on some sunscreen, freak!” What they don’t know is that my freckles, sprinkled far and wide across my face, give me UNGODLY power, like a solar panel fueled by Greta Thunberg’s motivational speeches.
articles.content:
Tortilla. Speckled Egg. Ugly Irish person. These are all measly insults that villains have spewed at me while I walk down the street as an extremely pale skinned individual. Oh how they laugh, oh how they cry. “Look at you! Spread on some sunscreen, freak!” What they don’t know is that my freckles, sprinkled far and wide across my face, give me UNGODLY power, like a solar panel fueled by Greta Thunberg’s motivational speeches.
I take these attacks with a cheeky smile, because I hold a secret that not one other soul knows. For every spot that emerges on my fair husk, I acquire a new portal to the past, where I travel to different decades and places warning folks about the high risks that come with not protecting themselves from the big ball in the sky. I keep a top-secret suitcase with me, stock full of sample sized Sun Bum, La-Roche Posay, and Neutrogena tubes. While it may seem that I am exhibiting great cognitive dissonance by not wearing sunscreen just so I can gain various entrances into history, it is a sacrifice I am willing to make for the good of all skin health and my own eyeballs. I am sick and tired of my professors clicking through slides and being APPALLED by crusty, musty, and dusty portraits. My grades suffered because I could only focus on the lack of moisture in JFK's pores, although I do understand now that when I visited him, perhaps I should have provided more advice than just CeraVe.
When night settles in, I crawl into a tiny little corner, bury my head and begin the ritual. “Spots on!” I whisper. At once, my beauty marks begin to glow, lighting up like a glittering sky. At random, one special dot beams extra brightly and my entire body compresses into a tiny ray, surging like a lightning bolt across time. It feels like someone jump started a car, and at once, I pop out into a random era. Some experiences have been more rewarding than others.
The furthest I have traveled back to is definitely the Prehistoric Era, where I helped a lowly band of velociraptors with their creamy applications. This experience was one of the most challenging, but only because their scales had complications with absorbing the preventatives. Velociraptors are actually quite receptive to heat protection. In fact, they were begging for me not to leave, basically pleading for more and more samples to help with burns. Turns out, it just wasn’t enough.
I also vividly remember visiting the woman in the Dorthea Lange picture from the Great Depression. I couldn’t lessen the impact of a failing economy but I could lessen the impact of the ozone holes! She was not super grateful for the addition of random products on her face and kept asking “Why are you giving me a banana-strawberry scented paste instead of an actual banana or a strawberry?” I could only think to say that she would feel just as fulfilled knowing that millions of people in the future will complement her complexion for its smooth texture.
My most recent stop was with Helen Keller. To my great surprise, she was actually real. To my even greater surprise, she was already a huge proponent of skin protection. I guess that when you lose ⅖ of your senses, the others become really sensitive so the sun was already very much on her radar. Because she was already ahead of the game, I used my power to spend time developing a brand with Helen. When we released the first product, You Can’t See Me translucent sunscreen, the world went bonkers as they could now achieve that effortless glow from sun safety. Her line was such a hit that we quickly followed up with more lotion variations, including You Can’t Hear Me (UV is the Silent Killer), I Can’t Speak (I’m Applying My Sunscreen), and I Don’t Fake It (This is My Real Skin).
I am proud of the impact I have made, reducing electromagnetic induced risks for folks every day. Maybe someday, the world will be cured and I can finally try out what I’ve preached all these years.
Spots off.
articles.name: Willa Norvell

articles.title: So You Call Yourself An Activist? STOP WASHING YOUR SHEETS!
articles.description: Everyone’s aware of the rising homeless community in Dorchester and Roxbury but we don’t even acknowledge as Boston University students commit VIOLENT GENOCIDE to the most marginalized community of all: The Bacteria colony in your sheets.
articles.content:
So You Call Yourself An Activist? STOP WASHING YOUR SHEETS!
By Ava Carrel

As I walk down the bustling street of comm ave and dodge a near body slam by the flaming red backpack of a rower on a scooter, I think about how much the city of boston has changed from my plethora of rich memories as a local 16 years ago (I lived in basically Rhode Island for 6 months). Me, my bottle of breastmilk, and poopy stinky diaper were regulars at historic spots such as Off the Wall Kidz Park and Boston just doesn't make drinks like they did anymore. Like any major city in America right now, Boston is facing issues like gentrification, skyrocketing rent, and homelessness. Everyone’s aware of the rising homeless community in Dorchester and Roxbury but we don’t even acknowledge as Boston University students commit VIOLENT GENOCIDE to the most marginalized community of all: The Bacteria colony in your sheets.

	The Bacteria colony’s indigenous lands are located in the bottom fold of your covers, right next to the void where the socks you kick off in the middle of the night become lost to the world. The Bacteria have a rich culture filled with joy, love, and the traditions that hundreds of generations have passed down. That yellowing patch on the corner that you called “fucking nasty” (Tell me, how does it feel to yell slurs with no shame?) was a mural honoring Binary Fission, the asexual reproduction process of bacterial growth. Yup, you just invalidated asexuality and are now cursed with 7 years of bimonthly UTIs. Washing your sheets seizes The Bacteria’s ancestral homelands in what your propaganda calls “weekly wash!” but is really a political power coup. You thought January 6th was bad? Your fabric softener is worse. And bleach? Unethical, inhumane, torture, must i continue? To put it simply, Obama dropped bombs on civilians but you dissolved an entire family with $3.50 and a tide pod. Say it with me now: LAND BACK!

	The displacement of The Bacteria colonies is a dire crisis and there are only so many resources for them to turn to when you ethnically cleanse their cultures and kick them out onto the street. My bed in Sleeper Hall, ninth floor and take a right out of the elevators, has become a shelter to house these refugees. I am 2 months into my freshman year of college and I have taken on the brave and noble responsibility of breaking societal norms and refusing to wash my sheets. Have I faced immense backlash? Yes. My roommate weeps gently to sleep every night as the border of bacteria slowly creeps closer and closer to her side. Have the masses tried to shame and shun me? Yes. Even the so-called “leftist” commies from the “History of Communism” class that I tried to convince to burn their laundry bags abandoned their marxist rhetoric when faced with the apparent dilemma of wash or not wash. Genocide or live up to the “wokeness” you claim to have.

	Of course this new living arrangement isn’t all fun and games. The Bacteria colony needs ample food and sweat to survive and grow. Every night I go to fit-rec and pick a roller hockey boy’s backpack to steal and wear one of those reflective sauna suits as they chase me around the rink for 45 minutes. Once I can feel the water pooling up to my knees in the suit, I brake check roller hockey boy and the student section goes crazy as they slam into the wall! I wring out my pushup bra into a petri dish to give to The Bacteria in solidarity with their efforts for political autonomy. All this working out has got me pretty toned; soon I'll not only be a giving, noble, kind ass person, but I'll have the gyatt to go with it.

	The world saw the sign in your lawn in 2020: “SILENCE IS VIOLENCE”. We saw the black square post too. I know it’s still in your archive, so don’t try and hide. So unless you’re ready to be the newest cancelee that we will be holding accountable through death threats, public instagram shaming, and yeast infections: join the revolution and STOP WASHING YOUR SHEETS.
articles.name: Ava Carrel

articles.title: Asking The Comm Ave Scientologists If They Can Cure My Ligma
articles.description: Say what you will about scientology, but those sons of bitches sure do know how to answer a question. That’s like their whole deal. I think.
articles.content:
First and foremost I would like to extend my thanks to my dear roommate Abby. Her fascination with scientology is truly one to be admired.  Yes, I know how that sounds…but fear not\! They’re not gonna get her\!\!\! I WON’T let them. To lose my dear Abby (okayyy dear abbeys reference. They were recently on my tik tok fyp and I got just a little bit scared\!) to those freaks would be the tragedy of a lifetime. Yes, the offer of a free personality test is tempting to the astrologically inclined, but if anyone can evade the grasps of the church of scientology’s sticky little fingers, it’s her.

Abby is the one who first put this idea into my head. We were waiting for the T late one night, trekking home to our west campus abode after an unsuccessful journey on which we were unable to find either the northern lights OR Mr. Beast. What a night that was. Anyways. We were standing there as we do and she pondered out loud, “Hmmm. I wonder if the Scientologists can cure my ligma.” And oh boy did I spring to my feet\! How had I never thought of this? I’d searched far and wide, high and low for a cure for my, nay, OUR affliction, to no avail. My valiant efforts came up inconclusive. Until now, that is…

Listen. Say what you will about scientology, but those sons of bitches sure do know how to answer a question. That’s like their whole deal. I think. Who’s to say\! Are their answers good? Well no\! Do they make sense? Well…no\! But I’ll take any answers I can get. And who in the world could have more knowledge, more sage wisdom than Xenu him(her? Their? it?)self, dictator of the Galactic Confederacy. I sat him down for a little conversation and believe you me, if I could share with you the wisdom that Xenu graciously imparted upon me, I would do it in a heartbeat. But I fear you must reach Operating Thetan Level III ☹. I mean I’ll try, but read at your own risk, you MIGHT die spontaneously of pneumonia. That would be a bummer.

articles.title: Paint N’ Shit: An Inclusive Twist on Paint N’ Sip for Bitches with Stomach Problems
articles.content:
There’s a shit river that runs deep throughout the Pinky Toe publication. All the members seem to be struggling with their tummy and bowel movements, hence them expressing their toilet time troubles through their articles. Although we’ve been called shit-talkers in other contexts, one way that we truly do talk shit is by talking about our own shits. But why just talk when we can express our feelings through a different method. The suburban wine moms shouldn’t be the only ones who get to partake in paint n sips. That’s why I’m proposing: Paint n shit
And no we’re not buzzfeed, we won’t be painting with our shit.
Instead of a normal studio, the pinkies can sit on portable potties just in case nature calls. No need to stop your artistic streak just because you need to fight your demons.
Possible drinks served could be:
Sextuple espresso martinis for the much needed coffee shits
Miralax cocktails
Pepto bismol smoothies
Alka seltzer shots
Laxative lattes
And with a variety of items to choose from to paint to express your deepest self:
Septic tanks
Colostomy bags
Bidets
Toilet seat covers
Squatty potties
Or bring your own! Just make sure to clean it first pretty please
The artwork you produce at your local paint n shit is perfect for the upcoming holiday season-
It’ll make the perfect gift for your nephew who is potty training or for your doctor after your next colonoscopy.
Definitely something that should be in the works for future semesters.
articles.name: Elana Felig

articles.title: We Are Not the Same: You Poop Till You’re Done, I Poop Till My Leg Falls Asleep
articles.description: It’s about that time. I’ve been sitting here for so long (writing this) that my left leg is starting to feel a tingly sensation. It’s falling asleep! Now, a normal person would take this as a sign to stop and come back another time, but we are not the same. I’m only halfway (if that!) through my movement, and I have an article to write. Sorry left leg, looks like you’re gonna have to wait. Maybe right leg will join you soon?
articles.content:
We Are Not the Same: You Poop Till You’re Done, I Poop Till My Leg Falls Asleep
By Doran Steinfeld

Hello, Pinky-Nation. As a writer for an honest publication that cares about honest journalism, I feel that I should come clean and be as transparent as I can when writing this article.
‍
For starters, I am currently on the toilet as I write this. I could give photo evidence, but even I have some limits when it comes to what I’m willing to put on the internet under my name. And I’ve done some crazy things! Just read my articles, and you’ll be enchanted by my IDGAFness (unless you’re trying to hire me… but it’s okay if you’re trying to hire me for, like, a comedy thing or something, in which case - hire me pls :3).
‍
I am also actively molting into my third phase, and will finish the hatching process in 2 half-moon cycles. You know, just girly things.
‍
But this is neither here nor there. This is toilet time, and mine is way more special and fantastical than yours could ever be.

‍
For starters: it hurts. My best friend Olga Syphil always used to tell me that “if it hurts, that’s how you know it’s good.” I speak of her in the past tense not because she is dead (you wish! She’s an 8th dimensional being, she can’t die lol), but because I have free will, and don’t you forget it. Back to my poopy time; it hurts, which means there will always be great reward for the pain I endure. Half the time. Scratch that, more like a quarter. Ehhhhh, maybe an eighth.
‍
It’s also a little frightful. If there’s one thing everyone knows about me, it's that I love a good spook. “You know Doran, oh, how he loves his little spooks!” And that I do. Sitting on the toilet is a scary thing. Ever since I grew the imagination bone in the brain, I started imagining horrible things like giant spiders crawling up the tube and snatching at my buttocks. It adds a sense of edge and suspense to the experience; will I get clawed, or will I evade the imaginary creature yet again?
‍
I also just have celiac disease. I’m not explaining this again. If you still don’t know what this is, go read my other article and come back. Are my shitstorms always celiac reactions? Probably not, but with all that celiac disease has taken from me, I think it’s more than fair for me to take a little back by using it as an excuse. #yesibelievethatequity>equality
‍
And oop! It’s about that time. I’ve been sitting here for so long (writing this) that my left leg is starting to feel a tingly sensation. It’s falling asleep! Now, a normal person would take this as a sign to stop and come back another time, but we are not the same. I’m only halfway (if that!) through my movement, and I have an article to write. Sorry left leg, looks like you’re gonna have to wait. Maybe right leg will join you soon?
‍
Sitting here, I do find myself in a pickle. I feel that there is more, and yet, nothing is coming out (#welcometotrump’samerica😔). This is when I would pull out the squatty potty, and get to work. However, I’m a college student living on Buswell. I have no such thing. But I do have a trash can. Time to kick off the pants, put those grippers on the edge, and lean forward in horrible posture.
‍
BOOM! It’s working. Haha. Knew it. I’m a pro.

But wait…

Uh oh….

The tingling has only gotten worse. My left leg is practically buzzing. In my mind, it’s just buzzing with excitement, because it knows that this is going to work, but what if…

No. I have no time to waste. It’s the last full week of school. I have shit to do, and not enough time to do it. I must finish this battle and move on to another one. And there’s only one way to do that.

Push.

And push.

And clench!

And then push.

PLOP!

I look down to see my creation.

Hold on. Something’s wrong.

That’s not a glorious mountain of excrement….

It’s a copy of my Apple Music Replay! Here are my stats!



















Side note: I am mad. HOW is there barely any Janelle Monáe in my top albums, despite the fact that she’s my top artist and takes up most of my top songs (trust. The top 100 is filled with her.)? I have an evil theory. I bet that Apple Music doesn’t consider it an “album listen” if you don’t go to the actual album and click play, which I think is stupid, because when I listen to Janelle Monáe, I go to my playlist titled “literally janelle monáe’s entire discography in order” and click on the first song of the album I want to listen to. WHERE IS ARCHANDROID ON MY LIST APPLE MUSIC!!!

articles.title: Getting Covid For The Fifth Time: The Queer Experience Is Bio Hacking Me
articles.description: I am a good upstanding american. I get my vaccines, I voted in that super awesome and cool election, sometimes me and my friends even like to pray when we get drunk. So tell me why last week I got covid for the fifth fucking time last week since 2022! Where am I going wrong, who have I double crossed? There is only one obvious explanation: it's the queer agenda.
articles.content:
I am a good upstanding american. I get my vaccines, I voted in that super awesome and cool election, sometimes me and my friends even like to pray when we get drunk. So tell me why last week I got covid for the fifth fucking time last week since 2022! Where am I going wrong, who have I double crossed? There is only one obvious explanation: it's the queer agenda.

I discovered the truth after doing research on my two most trusted sources: facebook and reddit, and I've cracked the code. The chemicals in GSU Panda Express are exactly infused with chemicals that slowly make you gayer. Ever wonder why that one girl friend who used to swear up and down she's straight was caught kissing girls after her break up? The chemicals! Sauce from the orange chicken actually contains miniature nanobots that travel up your spinal cord and turn on everytime you look at someone of the same gender. They transplant ungodly thoughts into your brain using vibrations, why do you think there have been so many mullets cut on campus this year?

Now you may be asking, how does this connect to you getting covid. Well after hiring a PI that I found on reddit I realized that some gay people on the BU campus are actually government plants. That situationship of yours: can not be trusted! After you pass out in their bed even though you probably shouldn’t, they are injecting you with an addictive variant of The Covid. First you get dangerously sick, then the high fever  makes you vulnerable to the gay enzymes multiplying in your blood stream. Why do you think youre still obsessed with that situationship who won't text you back? Think! Research! You are the victim of bio hacking!

articles.title: Digicams Across The Country Threaten To Unionize In Wake Of Halloweekend Abuse
articles.description: Canon Powershot A630 left us with this quote;“ our SD cards are full, double A batteries are dying, and our flashes are weak; this abuse without proper compensation cannot go on”.
articles.content:
Boston, MA - Monday, November 3rd Digicams across the country expressed their dissatisfaction with their working conditions after many were forced to do double overtime following the two halloweekends this year.

The double halloweekend this year didn't just send stupid freshmen to the hospital, a record high of digicam hospitalization has sent the digicam community into uproar. According to Beth-Israel hospital, they reported a 54% increase in digicam hospitalization. Dr. Poop, a digicam specialist, says that the increase in hospitalization may be due to a higher frequency of digicam being “willy nilly” on drunk girls' wrists.

“The digicam community really doesn't have the capacity in their wrist straps to handle this usage” says Dr. Poop.

In response to this, Digicams across the country has threatened to unionize because of this abuse. A Canon Powershot A630 has emerged as the head of this movement to unionize, calling for the formation of the UNited States Union of Digital Cameras. “For too long we’ve been under the control of drunk college girls, and it's time for us to take control over our bodies,” says A630.

The USUDG stated that they will be boycotting until their demands for fair compensation are met. “We want at least 64GB memory cards and to be kept in secured purses from here on out” says A630. This boycott will include refusing to turn on their flashes at frat parties until demands are met.

Digicams have been met with a lot of support from other cameras. The film camera union says “as fellow victims of abuse for peoples instagrams, we sympathize with Digicams and propose a mutual coalition of support”.  However, the future of the Union is up in the air after the Nov. 5th election.

This strike has disrupted many college girls nights out this past weekend, leading to talks about accepting a potential contract. Ultimately, this movement marks one of the most successful attempts at unionization in the past decade. A630 left us with this quote;“ our SD cards are full, double A batteries are dying, and our flashes are weak; this abuse without proper compensation cannot go on”.

articles.title: Rosanna Pansino please don’t cancel Mr. Beast. How will he visit BU now?
articles.description: Rosanna has put an incredible amount of time into slandering the good name of Mr. Beast. I ask you dear reader, how could a person with so much money ever be bad? People only get that much money because they treat people fairly and deserve it!
articles.content:
As many of you fellow chronically online diva’s know, some drama has been going down on the internet as of late. Rosanna Pansino and Mr. Beast have been firing shots at each other consistently ever since she was cheated out of her well earned win in a Beast Game. In this revenge saga she has reviewed the new and epic lunchly. Upon review and comparison to the typical lunchable Pansino found mold in her pizza lunchly. She had many other critiques towards the quality of the product and it’s obvious that she just doesn’t like her cheese drippy the way some of us do.
	Most recently she has reported Mr. Beast to the FBI for her concerns over inappropriate messages exchanged between him and his staff. Rosanna has put an incredible amount of time into slandering the good name of Mr. Beast. I ask you dear reader, how could a person with so much money ever be bad? People only get that much money because they treat people fairly and deserve it!
	Despite all of this, Rosanna, person to person I’m asking you for one thing. Ever since that fake post about Mr. Beast visiting BU, it has been my dream to meet him. I was absolutely devastated to learn that I had been misled and misinformed about his visit by social media. If the FBI takes him away then President Gilliam will never let him set foot on the hallowed grounds of our sacred school. Think about the lives of the BU students who you are affecting with your unfair and defaming actions. Please, grow a heart and some compassion for the young adults whose dreams lie in your hands.

articles.title: Help! My Soul is Trapped in an Early 2010s Digital Camera
articles.description: Im a hot girl in a digicam, you gotta click me the right way
articles.content:
‍

Yup, that’s me. The really hot girl with the digicam. But what if I told you that I was writing this from… inside the digicam…

As if senior year couldn’t get any worse, my life has decided to play out like I’m in an early 2000s DCOM and I have some essential coming-of-age life lesson that I need to learn. But instead of giving me a long-lost twin or finding my soulmate under some wacky circumstances, they stuck me in a camera.

‍

And not even a high-quality one either. It’s my dingy Canon PowerShot that I got in 2013. Honestly, I’m not even meant to be here. Sure I would shove it in everyone’s faces, blind people with the flash, and take a little too long to upload and distribute the photos, but does that make me worthy of this punishment?

‍

It really isn’t all fun and games either. Now I’m always on picture duty, I’m continuously reminded that my eyebrows are too curly, and the outfit I was in when I got stuck is impractical (It’s ice cold in there!). Who knew… a piece of technology has no warmth on the inside…

‍

Anyway, as I’ve been stuck in here for more than a month, I’ve decided to try and turn this wretched curse off and help out those who try and take photos using the camera in which I inhabit. I use the magical rays that shoot out of it to help them pose, make decisions about which friends are going to be in it, and make sure that both the horizontal and vertical photos look equally as good. But by golly, nothing seems to work! Why isn’t my plan of deliberately being nice, but not kind, to others for no apparent reason other than what I may gain from it working?

‍

Probably because of this: First of all, you uglies are ruining the classic photos that my poor PowerShot took. Second, I made a Dorian Gray-inspired deal with the geriatric owner of a camera shop in which I sold my soul to ensure that my youth and beauty would be secure while all the photographic versions of me on the camera would grow old and fade instead. But as it turns out, I had actually broken one of the cameras he owned on a drunken night out months prior so this was really just his way of cursing me as revenge. Which is like… ok… but look at all of the cunty photographs I have of myself now!

‍
articles.name: Ogenna Oraedu

articles.title: Tryna Hump Something: Being Attracted to Men in the Heat (haha) of Hockey Season
articles.description: The frustrating thing about this urge is that it comes and goes in waves, much like my positive opinions toward the male gender. But alas, here we are, and none of them are safe.
articles.content:
Tryna Hump Something: Being Attracted to Men in the Heat (haha) of Hockey Season

‍

I need to be sedated.

‍

I am in heat. Lusting. Gnawing at the bars of my enclosure. I am horny. 

‍

Is this was Edward felt like when he smelled Bella’s scent for the first time in Twilight? I feel bloodthirsty. I need to bite something. I need… to hump something.

‍

The frustrating thing about this urge is that it comes and goes in waves, much like my positive opinions toward the male gender. But alas, here we are, and none of them are safe. 

‍

I assumed everyone would be safe when I went to a hockey game. The cold temperatures would cool me down, and the aggressive masculinity would turn me off. Despite having an affinity towards pretty boys plagued with slight gay face, I do appreciate men with sleeper builds on occasion. But this. This was an entirely different beast. I turned into an entirely different beast.

‍

There is something about the way those young men glide on the ice with such precision, only to slam into each other with such force that is almost erotic. The crunch of their helmets against the glass. The anger in every push and shove. The violence of it all. It’s beautiful.

‍

And sure, maybe they are just skating around trying to get a ridiculously small projectile into a ridiculously big goal, but God do they love it. Maybe that’s what it is: seeing men actually passionate about something really does something to a girl. Like, “Wow. I guess you really do have the capacity to care for something other than yourself.”

‍

Don’t get me started on how protective they are of each other. Zoo wee mama. They would go to war for that little puck. They would go to war for each other. To swing on another man because he tripped your teammates? I’m throbbing. 

‍

Ok ok fine. I’m sorry for objectifying the men of our hockey team. They are the pride of BU. The future of the NHL. They worked hard to get where they are, and-

‍

Oh, who am I kidding? I start every game by checking the opposing team’s roster. I cheer the “sexy goalie” chant with glee because I really mean it. If the competition is hotter, I struggle to stay loyal to our team. But I love them. I love the fire, the energy, and the passion. Most importantly, I avoid sitting right in front of the glass because I am scared that I will lick it whenever one of them gets too close. Sorry!

‍
